39271983.review:
This game is an excellent example of deep interpersonal relationships done right. The plot, characters, art, and music all coalesece to produce a breathtaking piece of art that hits all of the emotional sweet spots. 

I do not want to go too much into detail but the plot of this game caught me by surprise on how fully fleshed out it is. The story kept me on the edge of my seat, not wanting to put the game down. The game made me feel a wide range of emotions as I played through it. Each character is loveable, their motivations and development are all very much present.

The art is beautiful, and expertly drawn to provide an air of elegence to the story. The music, done primarily by piano is a testament to the power of music and its ability enhance a story.

This is truly a 10/10 experience for fans of visual novels, and newcomers alike!

I highly reccomend for you to play through the routes in the following order.

First ----------------------> Last
Kaede -> Nao -> Sakuya -> Itsuki

Realmente é um excelente jogo,conta a história de asuka uma menina que não sabe bem o por que se tornou uma enfermeira e junto da sua irmã Nao tentam descobrir, a partir da aí você conhece mais duas personagens que são Itsuki e Sakuya e mais a professora Kaeda apartir de suas escolhas vocês entenderá melhor a história de cada personagem e mais para frente fará escolha que irá influenciar no final ( se será um final feliz ou triste) que por sinal são bem elaboradas e estramamente impactantes. 
 
Particularmente adoro esse design de Arte bem simples e adorável, as trilhas sonoras fantasticas que descreve bem o acontecer do momento e cenários bem simples e agradáveis que retratam bem uma escola de emfermagem, em fim...
Nurse live Addiction realmente é um jogo muito bem feito e muito bom de jogar, e também retrata vários acontecimentos do muido real. 

Você irá perder(ou ganhar..) várias horas jogando esse incrivel jogo pela KOGATO STUDIO com uma história que irá fazer você se aprofundar mais e mais para entender melhor a história de cada menina. Vale cada centavo :)

38768399.review: This game is by far one of the best Visual Novels I have ever seen or played. We have your awkward but relatable protagonist who is going through nursing school, and emotions! Great soundtrack, Adorable artstyle and engaging plot that makes this game practically impossible to stop playing. Th voice acting and the banter between characters will really warm your heart. My only regret is that I can only reccomend this game once on steam. The game is pretty long too, the prologue is about an hour and your first choice doesnt come until the first chapter, but watching the story get started is really worth the wait. I really do like how Nurse Love Addiction explores sexuality while being wholesome about it. And watching the protag grow up is really satisfying. Thank you KOGADO STUDIO and Degica for providing the world with this truly wonderful game, i seriously cannot thank you guys enough. Although this game is pricey it is definately worth because of the quality of it, 9 different endings, acheivements, good voice acting and art, choices that actually matter and really long playtime completely justifies the price, although i did buy it during the christmas sale since i'm not exactly wealthy. 真的是要怪自己买游戏之前不看别人的评测，万万没想到竟然踩了个这么个雷作，本来只是觉着这游戏人设这么美，风格这么清新，肯定是治愈向&发糖系的作品，结果怎么突然就神展开了呢。剧本量很短，7小时就跑完全线了，其中一半是共通线，共通线说实在的确实没什么大问题，无非就是蠢萌女主无意间勾搭妹子的故事，但是为什么进入角色线之后突然间就跟护士这个背景故事没啥关系了呢，[spoiler]一夜之间傻白甜女主多出了个逃离超能力研究所的身世，跟美人kiss之后转身就被别人往死里捅了一刀又是什么鬼，本来有个性的主角团突然就都变成非正常人类了(!?)，可爱的妹妹竟然病娇起来这么恐怖，就连公主也变成了多重人格的精神病。[/spoiler]这剧本突然展开真是让人措手不及，真是雷到我了。此外这还没完，这游戏BE简直劲爆啊，这么漂亮的画风下，怎么就出现诸如[spoiler]情侣变为纯肉体关系、SM、窒息play、碎尸并吃掉以便合为一体、跟死人kiss并结婚、等情节呢，[/spoiler]虽然共通线中期有一个失禁play已经够羞耻够让人觉着奇怪的情节了，可这BE的内容简直了，让人有点接受不了啊，搞得女主完全变为一个精神病了啊。
但是吐槽了这么多，为什么我还是推荐这部作品呢，毕竟，仔细想想，这些情节不正是人民群众喜闻乐见的嘛（笑）。

36534210.review:
几天下来，全成就达成啦！来写写测评和感受

我是冲着作画和百合入的游戏，作画我一定要给满分，用的颜色都很鲜艳亮丽，给人一种……怎么说呢，很美好的感觉。音乐也很不错，有几个bgm挺洗脑的，op我一听就有种要搞事的预感（事实证明我猜的没错233）。ed嘛，从的不同结局出来再听都会有不太一样的感觉，总的来说是我喜欢的风格。

配音方面，所有的人物（包括各种路人），都是有cv的，这点给赞。主役都是著名声优，不会出现棒读之类的尴尬场面，好评！我个人尤其喜欢妹线天台那一段，听得我都快哭了。

如果你认为这只是普通的校园或者职场百合galgame，那就大错特错了。我一开始也是这么认为的，认为这是一个凡人的世界，像花吻那样尽是糖的作品。然而事实是，甜是很甜甜，毒也很毒……我认为至少在故事的丰满程度和展开上，都对得起这个价格，嗯。
用我自己的话来说，这是一部“坑”式作品——主线（共通线）在轻松愉快的日常里不停地挖坑，然后在各个角色的支线把这些坑全部填上。当你把所有的支线都走过一遍之后，所有你在意的以及你没在意的疑惑都会解开（这点也看你是否细心了233）。不过整个流程大致还是一个线式的走向（结局除外），区别就在于你进入谁的支线就会同谁走近，然后知晓关于她的一切。到最后，四条线走完，你才算读完了这一个故事。
听我一句劝，如果你想玩正常的校园百合galgame，请尝试先走枫线，这条线相对其他三条线都算是比较独立，进入时机也同其他三条线不太相同，过程轻松。ge很甜，即使be也不太虐……其他三条就不太一样了…几乎全程压抑紧张，ge先不予评价，be是真的歪，疯狂给你喂屎，恶心到ge都救不回来……我个人对这种猎奇展开非常苦手，每当晚上要睡觉的时候就会想起那几个搞事bgm，然后自动脑补be…于是就这样失眠了两天，最后在b站找到了解毒药，才算很快地把它放下。[spoiler][url=www.bilibili.com/video/av4098227] 解毒[/url][/spoiler]

我和明日香简直是同类啊！唯一的不同是，我没有这样美好的[strike]后宫[/strike]

最后，玩完这作，我对炖肉产生了阴影……

34711147.review:
[h1] 关于汉化[/h1]
全路线通关撒花，默认游戏没有中文，需要去库里右键游戏，选属性，找到语言，选上中文，更新大约一个g的内容再开游戏就有汉化了，汉化质量挺好的，不是机翻，有汉化的galgame玩的就是舒服。
[h1] 玩游戏，长知识	[/h1]
通过游玩这款游戏，我学到了：桡骨（rao 二声）歹势（闽南话中的词汇， 主要意思是"不好意思",在道歉场合中连说两遍，还有"请原谅"的意思）ips细胞（百合无限好，谁说不能生）南丁格尔（英国护士和统计学家，刺客信条枭雄里，在暗杀医院里的圣殿骑士的前一个控制姐姐的任务里登场过）拝（bai 四声）古同“拜”。
[h1] 关于游戏	[/h1]
话说这款游戏我买的时候光看到了许多护士，就以为讲的是医院里的护士的百合生活，心想：太好了，终于有一款galgame游戏不是讲学生校园生活的了，结果。。。。。讲的是护士学校里的校园生活啊 ! 孔子说的好：你以为你以为，就你以为了？（孔子：mmp），游戏前期共通线基本就是欢快的普通学生生活，外加点贵圈真乱，等你进入个人线后就会发现：嗯？和前头玩的不是一个游戏？ [spoiler] 又是杀人，绑架，又是超能力的[/spoiler]，果然现在没点神展开都不敢出来混。
[h1] 关于成就[/h1]
共通线四个成就，单身线一个成就，之后四位可攻略角色，每人good end 和bad end各一个成就共8个，总共13个成就，具体进入各个线的方法可以去看指南写的很详细。通关任意一条线后标题界面就会出来小憩一下这个选项，点开内含六个声优感言，通关任意一条线解锁女主声优的配音感言，之后每通关一个可攻略角色的good end都可以获得对应声优的配音感言，全good end 和bad end都获得后，即可获得最后一个女主声优录制的全路线通关的感言，这些感言都没有字幕翻译，只能靠听，推荐能听懂一些日语的人听听试试。

7/10，话说靠自己选获得的是单身结局，我明明想进妹妹线的。。。。。之前玩的blood code（主角是女生，攻略帅哥的国产galgame），高恋(主角男生，攻略各种女同学的国产galgame)全是单身结局，果然不管控制男或女，是同性还是异性，单身狗这一固定属性是不可改变的。

34325063.review:
Теперь когда я прошёл данную новеллу я могу изложить о ней все свои мысли и чувства в этом обзоре.
Hakuisei Aijou Izonshou оставила во мне множество положительных и даже удивительных эмоций. Прекрасная атмосфера, лёгкая музыка, полностью проработанные персонажи, детально описанный сюжет, немного комедийных моментов и конечно милая романтическая постановка с направлением Юри. Вот что я больше всего люблю в жанре Юри, так это чистые романтические отношения, в которых показана забота героинь друг к другу, когда обычная женская дружба начинает перерастать в нечто большее, в настоящую любовь. Заботливая младшая сестра Нао, строгий сэмпай Сакуя, завзятая отаку Ицука и добрая учительница Каэда, с одной из этих девушек Асуке предстоит связать свою судьбу.
Теперь я бы хотел поделиться с вами своими ощущениями и подвести итоги, но предупреждаю дальше идут СПОЙЛЕРЫ. Теперь начнём:
[spoiler]
Первым роутом из четвёрки я решил выбрать Нао, так как он мне из всех больше всего понравился. История двух сестёр которые живут в одной комнате общежития, заботятся и поддерживают друг друга. А про то что у них общая цель, стать медсёстрами, я промолчу. Однако чего я не мог ожидать от Нао, так это то что ближе к концу роута она проявила свою “тёмную сторону”. Но не смотря на это Аска не прекратила защищать Нао, особенно когда Ицука нацелила на неё револьвер, и всё же всё закончилось хорошо. Сёстры остались вместе начиная любовные отношения, особенно учитывая, что они некровные родственники на самом деле. Самым забавным моментом в данном роуте было то что когда девушки целовались их застукала маленькая девочка, но даже это не остановила “сестёр”. Одним словом, я выбрал данный роут первым за его романтическую и слегка загадочную атмосферу.

Вторым для себя я выбрал роут Сакуи, так как данный роут мне больше запомнился драмой и трагедией. Поначалу идут флешбеки в результате которых Аска начинает вспоминать о своём прошлом, а самое главное, что Сакуя была подругой детства нашей главной героини и её первой любовью. Кроме того у Сакуи была сестра близнец, Кёко, которая сгорела в пожаре, в результате которого Аска потеряла свои воспоминания о детстве. Именно Кёко, а точнее её дух, в начале роута играет антагонистическую роль. Причина по которой она ненавидит Аску, в том что она всю жизнь любила Сакую и никому не хочет её отдавать (вот вам яркий пример яндэрэ которая влюблена в свою сестру цундэрэ). Почему же я назвал данный роут трагичным, спросите вы, и я вам отвечу, - Потому что в конце Сакуя умерла, при этом дух Кёко полностью взяла её тело. Но несмотря на это Аска решила начать новую жизнь с духом, так как это была последняя просьба Сакуи перед своей кончиной. А что из этого выйдет, вы сами увидете. Одним словом, роут Сакуи для меня стал трагичным роутом из всех.

Третий роут который я выбрал, это роут Ицуки. Больше всего данный роут мне запомнился тем, что в нём полно элементов шпионажа и боевика. Ицука на самом деле не та за кого себя выдаёт, она секретный агент некой таинственной лаборатории. Тут даже можно нашу героиню похищает давний враг Ицуки чтобы с помощью шантажа выведать все тайны. Однако Ицука знала о плане недруга и застала её врасплох, а заодно и девушку спасла(неплохая отсылка к фильмам о Джеймсе Бонде). Одним словом Ицука стала для меня эталоном настоящей шпионки, которую я когда либо встречал.

И наконец четвёртый и последний роут в моём списке, роут Каэды. В данном роуте присутствует лишь одна романтика, особенно считая то что тут развиваются любовные отношения между ученицей и учительницей. Тут же выясняется, что Каэда стала медсестрой по воле её семьи, в которой абсолютно все являются врачами, докторами и дальше в медицинском порядке. Кроме того у Каэды уже была девушка, с которой ей пришлось расстаться. Именно тут можно заметить некий признак ревности Аски к своей учительнице. Самой запоминающейся сценой в данном роуте для меня была то что когда девушки пересекались взглядами и шептали друг другу вокруг них образовывалась милая романтическая атмосфера, наполненная восхищением, заботой и любовью. Это самое прекрасное что я увидел в роуте и саму доброту Каэды к своей возлюбленной ученице. [/spoiler]
Теперь я подведу общие итоги:
Атмосфера: 10 из 10
Рисовка: 10 из 10
Сюжет: 8 из 10
Персонажи: 9 из 10
Музыка: 10 из 10
Итог: 9,5 из 10

34235660.review:
《Nurse Love Addiction》（中文：白衣性爱情依存症；以下简称“白爱”）是一款以护士学校为背景的纯百合游戏，讲述了校园里迷糊的女主角明日香与妹妹奈绪、两位[spoiler]老[/spoiler]朋友朔夜&一汐、以及老师枫的轻松日常[spoiler]（并不[/spoiler]生活。声优阵容强大，画风精美（被CG图吸引入坑），且是个平时不多见的护士题材，这些都是游戏中的闪光点：单凭这几点就值得在打折的时候入手了。然而在剧情方面，个人认为其没有达到与画风与声优相配的水准，主要有以下几点原因。

第一，Bad End太奇异。《白爱》共4条主线：妹妹，朔夜，一汐，老师。其中每条线各有1个good end和1个bad end，此外还有1个单身结局normal end。4主线的GE都很温馨美好，但是bad end各有各的黑，建议打算玩该游戏的玩家们只打good end且要跟着攻略来。（一些选项没根据+一旦选错就BE） 以下是吐槽BE且涉及到剧透的内容。[spoiler]4大BE中1个当小三，1个玩SM，1个强行结婚，1个吃人（？！）：最后1个真是突破了人的心理底线……剧情转折太突兀，作为傻白甜女主的明日香怎么就在最后1分钟黑化，成了沉溺于H/花样玩♂弄妹妹/霸王硬上弓结婚/吃人（？！）的地狱少女？果然粉色切开都是黑的（x），说多了都是泪……[/spoiler] 而部分GE里面也有很值得吐槽的点[spoiler]说的就是你，转世投胎的萝莉朔夜！[/spoiler]，这就涉及接下来要说的第二点了。

第二，世界观前后崩裂。在进入个人线之前，我真的以为这只是个看傻白甜明日香在护士学校逐渐成长、偶尔谈谈恋爱的轻松校园日常游戏；然而进后期个人线后才发现这个世界真是无奇不有（老师线逃过一劫）。后期涉及的元素包括：[spoiler]续命魔法（+1s）、秘密研究、灵魂寄生、女女生子、转世投胎……[/spoiler] 这些理应出现在科幻玄幻悬疑推理类作品里的元素与前期的平和校园日常形成了太过于鲜明的对比，以至于初通时后半程一直处于震惊状，HE的kiss图也无法缓解……[spoiler]还好初通是妹妹线，朔夜线的HE也实在过于刺激（母、母女弁？x）[/spoiler] 

第三， 剧情碎片化，有些跳跃。《白爱》的叙事并不连贯，常常是某日的情节之后突然跳跃到几天后的另一个情节，后期剧情紧凑所以问题不大，不过在前期的日常里就感到略有突兀。这一点不算槽点，属于个人的喜好。
	
在剧情上吐槽了很多，不过还是要说《白爱》是个值得一玩的百合游戏。它的画风相当精致，声优优秀、主题曲优美动听、4个可攻略角色各有各的萌点[spoiler]爱妹妹，爱朔夜❤[/spoiler]。也是因为这些优点让我对这个游戏给予了太高的期望，结果看来它并没有那么完美。对它的评价如下：
+赏心悦目的画风
+强大的声优
无功无过的bgm
--重口味的BE
--突兀的奇异展开

推荐给喜爱百合、心理承受能力强、喜欢精致画风（看脸）的玩家们。

34043444.review:
I definitely enjoyed this visual novel.  While visual novels are generally not literary masterpieces (and this one is certainly not), the writing in Nurse Love Addiction is generally good, the plot is suitably lengthy, and the scenario and plot twists turn into an entertaining, emotional rollercoaster.  This story is "yuri" in the sense that the it is about girls that fall in love with each other, but 'love' itself is explored in this visual novel in a emotional and literary manner.  Some scenes are (highly) suggestive (including some kissing and awkward moments) but there is not really any erotic or hentai elements here.

Strong points:
- The story (and translation) do a good job transitioning the main character (Asuka) from a clueless airhead at the start to someone that grows as the story progress.  The story has interesting twists, and the plot does strongly depend on which path is chosen by the player.
- Unlike many other visual novels, Nurse Love Addiction is nearly completely voiced, including that of the main character.  The voice acting is superb, particularly for Asuka (voiced by Azumi Asakusa) and her imouto Nao (Ai Kakuma).
- There are "bad" endings to the game, which allow each character's personality to be explored in compared to the "good" endings.
- The art is generally well-drawn and bright, which is appropriate for most of the scenes in the visual novel.

Weak points:
- I experienced technical issues with the game where the engine occasionally freezes or stutters for brief moments.  It was never clear what caused these issues, and while annoying the minor hiccups did not severely impact my enjoyment of the game.  The worst impact of the stuttering is when the game plays the ending video for each character's "good" ending, where the hiccups cause the video and the music to be repeatedly interrupted.  (And I really like the end theme too, Kimi to no mirai (A Future with You), sung by Yumi Hara.  At least I was able to fully appreciate it by buying the optional soundtrack DLC.)
- While the quality of the art is superb, there is not a lot of it.  Many scenes and character images are recycled frequently as the story unfolds.

33986711.review:
（大部分游戏时间未记录在案，写测评时已通 枫/奈绪 GE/BE 以及 放课后End）
（避免剧透，具体剧情从略）

[h1] 「百合」「护士」题材，相信不少人是为此而来——我也未能免俗。	[/h1]
我原以为这是一款仅仅以「护士」为噱头，满足百合宅的作品；我原以为我不会对一款游戏倾注过多情感。

能干的妹妹，令人憧憬的老师，温柔而骄傲的公主，爱捉弄人的池面——以及笨拙的主角。这样一看，角色单纯简明，令人不禁笑出来。

而进入剧情，熟悉的感觉涌上心头。
刚入学时交流想当护士的原因，以及明日香对未来的迷茫——我相信广大医科学子也思考过「为何学医」的问题。
游戏中医学相关内容的出现可谓得体。学生在校园活动中的「血压170/100，ii级高血压，注意饮食」，在职护士汇报工作时的「BP98/62，饱和度97%」，等等，使带有夸张和虚构成分的剧情扎根于现实。（iPS细胞则是伏笔）
而医院实习的剧情终于刺痛了我。剧情走向合情合理，可是我实在难以让明日香这个傻丫头承受那么大的打击。

[h1] 我与明日香产生了「共情」	[/h1]
虽然我自认为不像明日香，但是徜徉在剧情中，积极地看她在迷茫中成长。


第二章结束，剧情走低，不安弥散在字里行间。在和明日香一同经历了心理的挣扎后，因为错选进入了枫BE。
因为是带着强烈的感情，于是结局格外摧心。若是我来写，一定会用更平淡的笔调，描述这种表面的平静与彻底的崩塌。

然而这个BE是不完美的——不是剧情好坏，而是解释。整个枫线都是这样不完美，虽然不平凡的日常故事激起了我的共鸣，却对贯穿始终的主旨「星星」虚与委蛇。


[h1] 事情竟如一汐所言，「知道了就再也回不去了」	[/h1]
我可能会宁愿这个故事只有枫线。

BE后读了很久远的一个存档，折了枫老师的旗，鬼使神差地闯进了奈绪线。

……

看似波澜不惊的日常，潜伏着深渊中的巨兽。

[h1] 这就是我不喜欢本作的原因	[/h1]
第一，这种设定将剧情的现实基础连根拔起，如同我追求的是本格推理，却给我一部奇幻故事
第二，[h1] 我追求的「共情」是依靠亲身经历的现实维系的，庞大的超现实设定摧垮了我的共情	[/h1]
（第三，部分剧情可以说是猎奇了）


然而，本作在我心目中仍是良作。


关于「护士」，本作比某些搔首弄姿的作品不知高到哪儿去了。
尤其是医院实习的剧情，明日香的成长，对于护士的理解令人折服。
还有最喜欢的一点，GE最后，明日香升入二年级。在烛光中，诵读着南丁格尔誓词，完成加冠仪式。
[h1] 「护士」不是二次元中供人YY的形象。护士是同医生一起除人病痛的白衣天使。	[/h1]
[h1] 本作尽力描摹的，是天使之间的爱恋	[/h1]

33663985.review:
This game's name (which is incidentally just about the worst I've ever heard) and marketing suggest it is a yuri title. It isn't. Some other reviews and the Steam tags have suggested it contains elements of horror. It doesn't. I mention these facts, not as criticisms, but simply to advise that if romance, titillation and/or a scary atmosphere are what you're after, you'll be disappointed. Personally I'd done my homework and bought it [i]because[/i] it wasn't a yuri VN, however it wasn't quite as subversive as I had hoped.

Asuka is a first year student at Teito Nursing Academy. She's there because she found a scrawl in the back of a childhood picture book which indicated she wanted to become a nurse. She doesn't remember writing it, so wants to pursue this career path a bit further to see what could have possibly drawn her to it in years past. Older sister to Nao by age, she's actually quite infantile in her behaviour and relies on Nao for complex life skills like getting out of bed and microwaving food. While at the academy she meets Sakuya and Itsune, both of whom alternate between treating her with kindness and contempt, but she befriends them anyway. This is the jumping-off point for a story which really doesn't have much to do with any of that.

The characters are all paper-thin and not particularly endearing, much like the world of NLA itself. It also takes quite a while to get to the real meat of the story. In the run-up you need to endure a liberal peppering of the standard sort of irritating, unrealistic, irrelevant slice-of-life exchanges: (fictitious example) "You know, you really shouldn't eat bananas before paragliding..." "Waaaaah, but I love bananas!!!" "Uh uh uh, senpai Marimurimato says that bananas can cause gas when combined with stomach-churning activities. That could be quite embarrassing." "Hmmm... that's a good point... okay, I will eat bananas when I return." "Yayyy!!!" [My sister's eyes gleam with enormous pride at my developing sensibilities concerning food consumption.]

If it needed to be classified by genre, I'd probably call NLA a mystery novel. I'd love to elaborate on that further, but the mystery of NLA lies not only in the answers, but what are even the right questions. The yuri stuff really is just window dressing. I never felt as if Asuka was building even the faintest semblance of a real relationship with any of the other characters. Rather, the various "love interests" simply act as facilitators for the conveyance of different pieces of the mystery, with a couple of brief smooches sprinkled in. On that note it's also worth mentioning that up until the final chapter each route is substantially the same, most choices are inconsequential, and the good and bad endings are determined solely by the final choice, so there's not a tonne of story content. I found my first run quite engaging, as questions and new plot points are introduced at a steady rate, which left me hungry for answers, but the revelations in subsequent runs felt comparatively minor.

An exception to what I wrote above is dear sensei Kaede's route, which is stereotypical VN romance fare. It's pretty facile, has no relevance whatsoever to the broader story, and can safely be skipped entirely. I actually think the game is weaker for its inclusion, as it's a total waste of time and could easily give the wrong impression to a player unfortunate enough to have it as their first experience.

The bad endings are a common point of discussion around NLA. Yes, the consequences are a lot worse than the standard failure to get the girl, but they're far from soul-shattering, tear-inducing festivals of despair. My reactions were more along the lines of "lol wut" as most rely on Asuka doing things which are quite literally insane. Granted, she's not the sharpest tool in the shed, but she's nonetheless totally compos mentis, which make these abrupt excursions into nutville pretty hard to take seriously.

Is it worth $40? Not even close. I got it for half price and still feel short-changed. The only sprites in the game are those of the major characters, their poses are very limited, and there is maybe a couple-dozen backgrounds. By VN standards the writing is serviceable but far from impressive. It is fully-voiced (in Japanese), so I guess that's what you're plunking down most of the dosh for, but personally I couldn't care less about voice acting in VNs, as I just skip to the next dialogue box as soon as I'm done reading. Price is ultimately the deciding factor in what side of the not / recommended binary I'm putting this on. $40 is a premium price for an interesting but ultimately lacklustre product. If this was closer to $10 I'd say yeah, check it out on a whim, though don't expect to be blown away, but $40 is much too prohibitive for that sort of exploratory purchase. There are VNs with [i]way[/i] higher production values being sold for less.

33555196.review:
[h1] This game will make you wish you owned a puppy petting centre, because your emotions will be beyond repair after experiencing this story.[/h1]  Those bad endings...Holy smokes are they something...

[b] Seriously, don't write this off after just reading the title or looking at screenshots, 
because it really is so much more.[/b]

The writing is really well done along with 4 yuri character options that have multiple complex endings to achieve. 
(Although Sukuya is the canon/most informational choice)
In addition, I really enjoyed the main protagonist as she was pretty relatable to, was a lot of fun, and definately had her flaws but still kept a great heart. 

Now most importantly, the story- 
-Just fantastic. I wasn't able to guess most of the upcoming events/plotpoints which is definately impressive and refreshing for a change. 
Despite having multiple endings, none of them feel like a cop out and are all satisfying or impactful.
Some of those bad endings as well...Just DAYUM...Are they ever something else.
Also, I [b]highly highly highly recommend that you DO NOT[/b] search up any screenshots or discussions about this game to avoid any possible spoilers. Trust me you'll thank me for this.  

[b]I'm not proud to admit that manly tears were (MAYBE) shed during the playing of this game.[/b] 

Tired of rampant fanservice combined with the eye ball rolling, terrible story-telling that other VN's offer?
Then Nurse Love Addiction is for you! 
[b]If you're a yuri fan, then you NEED to play this already![/b]

33479970.review:
DON'T just be fooled by the art and the simple summary "Experience the story of... discover[ing] love, medicine, and adulthood." There's another review on the internet that says that [b]"Psychological Horror" is a recommended tag for this VN. Let that sink in for a minute.[/b] 

Knowing that, if you're still down for this VN, then yes, I would recommend you to get it just for the art and music. The story is divided into 2 arcs. The first is very sweet and fluffy and typical romance. The second one takes a sharp turn into darker, more 'wtf' territory. In my opinion the first arc is well written, made my cringe and do all the things that fluffy things do, and the second one... is okay. For some routes I think the psychological horror schtick was a little contrived for shaking out angst and horror. I'm a chickenshit though and usually horror is not my cup of tea. 

There are 9 ends to the game. 1 bad and 1 good end for each romance option and 1 option where you end up with no one and the game ends early. Like some other reviews have said, most of the psychological horror shit comes from bad ends. But even in some 'good ends' I felt like the horror was a [i]very[/i] cheap way of 'maturing' the protagonist Asuka by literally throwing her into some ridiculous dark drama. I felt more than a bit cheated of the premise where I would 'see these girls come into adulthood'

Recommended route: Kaede -> Nao -> Sakuya -> Itsuki.    OR    Nao -> Sakuya -> Itsuki -> Kaede

I played it like: Sakuya -> Nao -> Itsuki -> Kaede -- and for anyone who has played all the endings, they know [spoiler]this is basically the most to least fucked up routes order[/spoiler].

33432022.review:
妹ルートを終えて、途中ですが書きます。全部やろうとは思っています。

二人目を攻略していて感じました。ルート確定するまではとても面白い作品です。
丁寧で余裕のある作り。キャラクターはちょっと濃いですが、まあゆっくり成長していくのも悪くないかな、なんて気分になります。前作も一緒に歩めた気がしますし（うろ覚え）。
ともかく、看護学校あるあるとか、膨大な医療用語の片鱗を、ゆっくりじっくり面白く味合わされるのかと思っていたのですが…。



いきなりビュンビュン時が飛び始めた辺りから、急速に置いてけぼりにされました。キャラクターにも、シナリオにも。
前半と後半でライターさんが変わったのかと思うほど差があるテンポ、描かれない裏側、回収されないキャラクターの想い…。
つらくて苦しい部分にはフタをするような、無かったことにしてしまうようなシナリオの流れには正直ついていけていません。そこを二人で、いや、周囲の協力と共に寄り添って、乗り越えて、というような百合を期待していた身としては残念です。

キャラクターが見ていて本当にかわいそうで、いたたまれなくなります。
長い年月をかけた想いなのだから、それ相応のテキスト量・質で描いてやるべきなのでは、と感じました。


乱文、失礼しました。

32851375.review:
Love Addiction，就算是异性之间，也是正常的。作为一个爱情上瘾患者，妻奴。这个游戏真的打动到我。和女朋友也是同样的年纪认识，就像笨蛋明日香一样，笨笨的，或许我就是她的妹妹。和游戏里一样照顾她，守护她就算用各种很自私的方式。
梦想就像天上的星星，摘星人的年纪，遇上和星辰一样美丽的爱情，这样的回忆可能是内心最柔软的地方吧。Nurse Love Addiction给我们讲了一个故事，一个摘星星的故事。每一句对话都可能勾起你的回忆，每一个背景可能都是一段往事。可爱，幼稚的对话引爆你的萌点，没有世俗社会的掩饰，纯真的感情，突如其来的感动。对于别人可能这就是一段幼稚的爱情，而对于我这是一片回忆，可能我和这个游戏太像了吧。甚至专业都相关。
我的故事是很多条线糅合在一起，而作者似乎不能明白，玩家要的感动不是征服妹子，也许傻傻的躺在妹妹的温柔乡里看着别人成双成对也是一种享受。我宁愿这游戏只有这一条线。就不能学学花吻系列？。这一条线，对我就够了，也是我想要的。
剧情真的不错就算是BE也好，妹妹的BE感觉比HE给我的触动更大M的心态使然。打出BE的时候真的哭了10多分钟，不知道为什么。而中途那个妹子死掉的时候让我直接关了游戏，同样穿着白大褂的身份，看不下去，完全能理解明日香的心情，甚至可能比游戏里表现的更加难受，无法说出口的心痛。综上，2分让你嘴角微微上扬的温馨，8分让你热泪满眶的心痛。这应该是制作这个游戏的配方吧。

32826497.review:
妹妹虐我千万遍，我待妹妹如初恋。

果然还是写点东西比较好，考虑到已经有一阵子没有玩这种类型的游戏了，印象中上一次完整玩完有选择支的游戏已经是有个几年了，貌似是柚子社的啥来着的，不管怎么样，文字类AVG的游玩经验实在不足，说是评测，可能也只能是个人感想，能安利一个是一个，不能就我一个人入教。
目前从开始游戏到现在是毅然决然的走了妹妹的路线（介于本人玩这类游戏的习惯...也不会考虑继续走别的路线了），整个流程初体验占据了我5个小时的时间，去掉看回放和舔屏幕的时间大概4个小时左右，故事长度只能说是意犹未尽吧，日常部分和个人路线的剧情衔接太过生硬，后期很多魔法的设定忽然加入进来也略显牵强，中途强行掐掉半年的时间让我个人觉得制作组的叙事能力还是有待提高的。游戏考虑到是15+，所以也是不会有太露骨的场面描写，不过个人并不讨厌这种清新的感觉，这样的整体氛围和百合的主旋律非常契合，反而让我觉得这是一个加分点。顺便值得一提的是游戏在中文化方面的制作也是挺用心的，通篇下来没有明显语病，更没有特地的过于卖梗和机翻痕迹，作为一款文字AVG游戏实属不易，虽然我是并不喜欢把语言作为给一个游戏的加分点，不过如此精良的制作不禁也是有点感动的。
简断截说，这是一款画风到故事整体都十分清新的百合游戏，尽管在叙事方面还能有所突破，不过我依然是很享受整个流程，各种选择支也能拜托一味单调的互动小说流程，有一定的重复可玩性，
最关键的一点——妹妹很可爱！奈绪超级可爱！

31762558.review:
Desde el momento en que abres el juego y escuchas la voz de Yukari Tamura, sabes que esta VN tiene calidad, en cualquier obra nippona siempre reconozco 3 seiyuus; Yukari Tamura, Mizuki Nana y la que hace de tsundere, así que arrancamos bien, de ahí pasamos a la interfaz donde predominan los colores pastel (veo en más de 16 colores) la cual parece más un diario en blanco que el jugador irá llenando a medida que las diferentes rutas sean completadas, simple pero funcional.

En el apartado musical predomina el piano, con melodías que se repiten sin fin, pero no cansan, están bien hechas, además de otras canciones que ambientan en situaciones tensas, visualmente es lo que se espera de una VN diálogos con ilustraciones, y locución de las actrices, que de nuevo, muestran gran calidad.

La temática es Yuri (lesbianismo) pero pasa de ser morbosa, trata el tema de forma madura, pero evita caer en el drama y la pretensión, permitiendo situaciones alegres o cómicas, se aleja del fanservice, tan común en la actual animación japonesa, [spoiler] (gracias otakos) [/spoiler] así que, si buscas ilustraciones subiditas de tono, sonidos obscenos o el parche +18, lo siento esto no es para ti, pero tienes las series Sakura.

Lo que me encantó de esta VN es que posee un buen desarrollo de personajes, las chicas hacen más cosas aparte de ser lesbianas, [spoiler] (de hecho dudo que estas chicas sean lesbianas, simplemente encontraron a ese ser especial y da la casualidad que es de su mismo género, lo cual es muy romántico) [/spoiler] lo que permite conocerlas mejor, dentro de sus arcos narrativos hay actividades que van mostrando la personalidad de las protagonistas, y pese a que desde el inicio se establece una pareja, [spoiler] (Itsuki y Sakuya) [/spoiler] el tema no es explotado, se llega a él en ocasiones y de manera natural, la clave es la sutileza, eso sí el arranque es lento, es una maratón no un sprint.

Jugablemente lo de siempre, leer diálogos (en un perfecto inglés), escuchar los diálogos (en perfecto Japonés) y esperar el momento para tomar decisiones, alterando el rumbo de la historia y desencadenando “x” final (son 9 en total, acompañados de un video con los créditos), en mi partida obtuve el final general, bastante soso, así que consulté una guia, no me gusta la idea pero quería obtener los otros finales y evitar el backtracking. 

En lo técnico tiene sus detalles, uno de ellos es que no puedes hacer capturas de pantalla, de hecho toda la interfaz de steam queda deshabilitada, impidiendo ver notificaciones e incluso los logros que vas obteniendo (aun así en el foro hay capturas, que supongo son de la versión asiática), al ser una VN requiere muy poco, y lo mejor, tiene nube para sincronizar la partida.

La historia gira en torno a Asuka cuyo sueño es convertirse en enfermera (de ahí el título) y para ello ingresa a la Teito academy junto con su hermana menor Nao, dentro de la academia conoce a Itsuki, Sakuya y la profe Kaede, juntas irán aprendiendo el oficio, en clases, prácticas en laboratorio y campo, [spoiler] (Yiki-chan T_T...) [/spoiler] pero también se dan situaciones como ir a la playa o al karaoke, en donde lentamente se desarrollan relaciones afectivas [spoiler] (de hecho el punto de bifurcación en las historias ocurren en la playa) [/spoiler] y se desvelan secretos, personalmente recomiendo ir primero por la ruta de Kaede es la más… normal, romántica, linda... (aunque el final malo me destrozó, en general los finales malos son muy dolorosos) porque en las rutas de Sakuya y Nao se pone más turbio y se desvela más secretos, en lo personal recomiendo dejar a Nao de última, sin entrar en spoilers, en esta ruta el juego se saca un Railgun de nivel 6, (si entiendes la referencia y la ambientación “farmacéutica” de la obra, no hace falta que diga más) el juego parece terminar justo cuando se forma una pareja y salen los créditos, pero no, después de estos, se muestra el final, (bueno o malo)

En cuanto al costo, es elevado pero, su calidad compensa, y no solo en lo técnico, la historia es bonita, con giros inesperados, y sus personajes carismáticos, si estás harto del fanservice y el queerbait del anime te la recomiendo. Lo único que no me gusta de esta VN es que no tenga un final en el que todas sean felices, amo a estas chicas, pero solo podrás tener el corazón de una, inevitablemente tendrás que mandar a la queer zone al resto, y me duele darle la espalda a cualquiera de ellas. [spoiler] (sobre todo a Nao, gomen ne Onee-chan)	[/spoiler]

31658544.review:
This story takes place across a three-year period where you, Asuka Osachi are training to become a nurse. Along the way you may find love with someone you meet. The four potential love interests are your teacher, Kaede Ohara, your two classmates Itsuki Amatou and Sakuya Takeda, or your younger sister (and fellow nurse trainee) Nao.

Your choices determine who you end up with, if any of them, and whether it will be a short-term thing (bad ending) or happily ever after. There are also some heavy twists in the storylines.

There is a lot of material in this game, which is good considering the price. Still it is worth it, if this is your type of game.

31232953.review:
每一段Galgame的故事对我来说 就像是在体验一段新的人生经历一样，
自己扮演着不同的角色在不同的世界里，有那种活在其中 感受着各种各样不同人生的感觉，
这就是Galgame吸引我的地方。

作为自己的生日礼物，我很认真的把这款游戏所有的线路通了一遍。
直到通关的那一刻，看着自己打出来的CG，一个个不同的结局都让我回味无穷。
我很喜欢あすか的那份朝气和自信，「あたしがやれば出来る子」...
是呀，不论做什么，只要努力都是可以做得到的。

我也喜欢妹妹なお，并不是因为她是妹妹，
即使没有血缘关系，也能照顾自己喜欢的人那么多年，
没有任何的利益关系，哪怕这样的爱情有点自私有点扭曲，
但我依旧是那么喜欢她这样爱一个人的方式.

游戏的画风给人一种甜美的感觉，色彩让人看着就觉得舒服，
不管是人设也好，每个角色的服装设计也好，剧情的布置以及配音，
都是非常优秀的，喜欢百合Galgame的玩家千万不能错过这款游戏喔~

31193124.review:
作为一部普通的百合作 依存症是合格的，但是作为症候群的续作 毫无疑问是不合格的。
无论剧情 人设 甚至文本量 都相差甚远。说一点最明显的 至少症候群很明显的展示了什么叫白衣，而依存症写到后面感觉像是跑偏了。。神奇的研究所摧毁了前面所有的铺垫，一个研究所似乎解释了前面的所有问题，我个人是很讨厌这种简单粗暴的解释方式的，而且让人感觉似乎依存症似乎和白衣没什么太大关系。。好吧抛开这些不说，依存症依然是一部不错的百合作，无论CV，BGM还是画面，啊 画面有的时候会崩，，尤其BGM确实非常非常棒，也是我唯一觉得续作超越了前作的地方（症候群的画风毕竟是两个时代就不比较了）。CV一如既往的闪瞎眼也可以保证一下游戏质量。
玩依存症的时候需要忘掉症候群的剧情，因为确实没啥共通的，除了学姐的一个小彩蛋和没啥关系的治愈之手。单就依存症的剧情来说，也还是可圈可点的，依然继承了前作的不玩完所有线你没法了解整个故事的风格，以及前半段欢乐后半段变黑的不良传统。BE更是毒出一片新境界。不过至少HE还是相当甜的，不过缺点就是奈绪太可爱导致我通了妹线以后就并不想再过另外两条线了（因此我使用了神奇的某度来帮我补完剧情）。
因此，虽然我认为依存症比不上症候群，在剧情上有所欠缺，但也算是一部很好的百合作，对于百合党来说仍然是必入的游戏。

[spoiler] 不过对于百合党来说，只要沾着百合两个字应该就会直接买买买了吧。。（笑）[/spoiler]

31100745.review:
游戏是几天前玩的了，可这几天还是一直沉浸[spoiler]纠结[/spoiler]在它的余韵中。想了想写下人生第一篇游戏评测。

首先，把可能要费一些功夫才能找到的东西贴出来，如果因为这部作品粉上了主创人员，不妨顺着这些情报摸过去了解更多哦。
游戏的官网：[url=http://hakuai.kogado.com] 点这里[/url]
[b] 剧本（Scenario）[/b]：	  	          向坂冰绪 先生（小说也很棒）
[b] 企划（Planning）[/b]：		           みやざー 先生：  [url=https://twitter.com/miyazar] twitter[/url]
[b] 人设（Character Design）[/b]：	   早瀬あきら 先生：[url=https://twitter.com/akira_hayase] twitter[/url]
　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　[url=http://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=13804934] pixiv[/url]

好的，题外话说完了，接下来谈谈个人感想：
[list]
  [*]　　剧情和配乐恰到好处，所营造的清新平淡的氛围让人十分的享受。整部剧弥漫着轻快的气息，若能神游其中，就会感觉到自身惬意如同水母。在作者笔触中，惨烈的事实也平淡如是，一切都充满了脱俗而美丽的文艺气息。总而言之，对于日常部分，我是真心想要笑着点头，真心愿意竖起大拇指赞赏的。
　　留一单段说：画风十分对胃口，立绘细腻，场景和整体的色彩都很能让人感到温馨。
　　顺带一提，角色线部分剧情很有[spoiler]很有[/spoiler]冲击性。可以说是本部的个性之精华所在了。

 [*]再谈谈不满意的地方，这部分十分的主观，有意见也请指出。
　　有些剧情太过王道，显得有点低龄，容易出戏而影响感官体验，那部分就像丝绸上的麻布一样“鹤立鸡群”，让人不快。而且人物设定有点缺乏个性（尤其一开始给人印象更是如此），像是马大哈太过教科书而缺乏实感，让人有种脚不着地的感觉。总体而言，大概是那常同“萌”伴生而出的“幼”感让我觉得有点膈应吧，任性点说，我更希望看到更自然的“可爱”。
　　以及角色线部分，不知道是不是我囫囵吞枣了，觉得过渡有点短，有点促。不同角色线的剧情仿若不同的天地，一条角色线会把另一条角色线会出现的问题远抛脑后（有些问题甚至不是因为选项选择不同导致的）。可以这么说，从不同角色线得到的情报有些是相悖的，还是那句话，让人觉得不实。
[/list]

　　不管怎么说，瑕不掩瑜，而且制作组很有诚意很热情，这可以说是极大的加分项了，这也是我写下这评测的动力。加油吧！
　　最后说句不认同就是不客观的话：既然第一遍没有走到任何一条角色线，那么就是说，明日香是我的！

30937538.review:
基本上這類遊戲自帶中文就先給好評了

遊戲內容整體上來說還OK
大概就是一半的老套路+一半的驚喜感+一點點的小感動
原價購買的話稍貴，我是特價6折入手，差不多就這個價值吧

全攻略全成就就是我的遊戲時間10小時
但我長期閱讀所以速度比一般人快些，大約+2小時就是大家的平均時間

以下大雷小心觀看




先說幾個我有猜到的路線
1.妹妹線會黑化
2.公主和一汐有死亡線
3.老師線就是套路，大致上能猜到
4.看到漫遊的地方我就在想這遊戲該不會要搞同性繁殖吧

再來說說我沒猜到的亮點
1.陪優希尿失禁和優希之死，她死得比我預期還早
2.SM他妹的結局
3.我上面說的同性繁殖只是猜測，沒想到會放在其中一個結局裡
4.公主才是器官，恭子是本體

整體來說6折入手其實還是貴了點，畢竟遊戲時間真的不長
而且這遊戲所能帶給你的快樂是你看了前面很多鋪陳後，最後一次解開所有謎團給你
所以並不適合重複遊玩

30857712.review:
Ho comprato Nurse Love Addiction nella speranza di trovare una visual novel carina, ma mi sono pentita dell'acquisto già nel giro della prima mezz'ora di gioco. Scrivo questa recensione dopo aver giocato per poco più di tre ore (secondo il timer di Steam, almeno).
I disegni sono carini, senza dubbio, ma il suo fascino praticamente finisce lì. La storia progredisce a passo di lumaca e non ho fatto in tempo ad arrivare alla parte più "interessante" (per così dire) della trama prima di cominciare ad annoiarmi a morte. Nel corso della novel gli avvenimenti che si trovano sono un ammontare di cliché che ogni appassionato di anime e manga avrà imparato a conoscere, a partire dai personaggi: una protagonista pigra, sbadata, goffa e con un sogno nel cassetto immensamente più grande di lei che decide di andare a frequentare un'accademia per infermiere, la sorella minore brava in tutto e perfetta mogliettina che stravede per lei, la signorina di buona famiglia dalla parlata raffinata e palesemente tsundere, la compagna della signorina di buona famiglia che è un po' il maschiaccio della situazione e si comporta come un vecchio volpone, la professoressa idolo delle folle con problemi di autostima. E poi la protagonista che si sveglia in ritardo, che fallisce nel tentativo di rifare un letto e lo rende tanto orribile che nel gioco lo censurano con l'effetto pixel (avete capito bene, RIFARE UN LETTO), che si ritrova nel posto giusto al momento giusto quando bisogna spiare incontri segreti. Quando poi ho visto che le è volato via l'ombrello proprio quando casualmente una delle ragazze era lì pronta a farla stare sotto il proprio, o quando ho visto la sua scivolata che l'ha fatta cadere per pura coincidenza su un'altra ragazza con tanto di palpatina al seno, ho capito che questo gioco non offre altro che una gran vagonata di fanservice. Elemento che mi aspettavo ci fosse, sia chiaro, ma speravo non fosse l'unico elemento presente.
Non consiglio affatto questo gioco. Se siete qui per il fanservice, cercatevi qualcosa di meno costoso, o come minimo aspettate che sia in saldo.

画风见仁见智，但音乐方面个人感觉比较差，有些场景的BGM表现出的气氛和剧情差别很大。CV方面相信不少玩家是田村大魔王或者助手的粉丝，就卜多谈了

主要登场人物，确切地说有立绘的人物太少，这点给人感觉略微偷懒。感觉至少同组的[strike]双胞胎[/strike]妹子、优希、澄香这几个角色应该有专属立绘吧，虽然她们的戏份确实不多。主要登场角色中个人比较喜欢奈绪，[spoiler] 同时兼具能干的妹妹+不良少女的性格，非常讨喜[/spoiler]。[spoiler]当然老师和明日香深情互望那段也是看一次笑一次[/spoiler]

剧情方面比较突兀，妹妹、朔夜、一汐三条线中，前半段和后半段风格差异巨大。并不是说没有伏笔（倒不如说伏笔挺多的），但从偏现实的校园青春风格转为科幻/魔幻风格个人不太适应。可能对玩过前作的玩家而言接受起来比较容易吧

[spoiler] 而且该说是有先入为主的成见还是什么，共通线屡次提到抓到“星星”这个意象，我还以为是代指理想、梦想之类的东西，主角等人在学校屡屡沉迷学习的情节好像也印证这个想法。然而到各条线最后，似乎又表示星星=恋人，而成为护士的梦想又来自一部特摄片。。。所以明日香当年的梦想其实是成为高达？[/spoiler]

值得一提的是各个END。我个人玩这类游戏的时候不太在意结局，但本作的END存在感太高了，[spoiler]奈绪、枫线的BE还可以说是编剧的恶趣味，一汐线的BE就有点猎奇了；朔夜线的BE其实挺好，而GE先是主角和并不喜欢的人结婚，后是恋人转世为自己的孩子，从各种角度都给人感觉很糟[/spoiler]

最后看了一下，虽然本评测说的主要是缺点，但原因是优点已经被其他人说完了。。。

29554221.review:
If your mind is lost somewhere down in the metaphorical gutter of sexual innuendo, you probably looked at this game and figured it'd make fine fap fodder. A game about Nurses (who are oft oversexualised in games) and the promise of Nudity in the Tags might lead one to believe that this game is just another Eroge that's been "censored for steam."

[h1]However, Nurse Love Addiction is so, so much more than that. It is, in fact, a genius excercise in subversity.[/h1]

With no nudity to speak of and romance taking the back seat, Nurse Love presents us with the story of a young girl. Her name is Asuka Osachi, and she's just getting started at the Teito Nursing Academy. However, there's more to her friends than initially meets the eye. Nurse Love begins as a humble visual novel about nursing and evolves into a full-on mystery that will have you thoroughly gripped throughout.

The game has an absoloutely gorgeous art style, perfectly blending watercolour backgrounds with characters in the style of lightly drawn manga. It's a wonderful combination that gives allows characters their own individual quirks and expressions. It's honestly impressive that, despite sharing an art style, the six leading ladies all look and feel entirely unique and special.

In addition, the way characters are arranged in scenes is utterly genius. Making strong use of perspective by placing characters in both the foreground and the background, Nurse Love creates the illusion of life in each of its heroines with startling success. The CG, similarly, uses flash cuts to create action scenes in still images; not unlike something you might find in a comic or manga. It's such a simple trick, and yet it's so effective at what it does.

The music is predominantly played on a piano, which blends seamlessly with the overall theme of the VN and with the art style to create an old-fashioned vibe that suits it very well. It also achieves this without being overly agregious about it, and trying to thrust it in your face. The cheery and upbeat piano helps create a smooth flow as you ease your way through the story. What's more, the further you go and the deeper you dig, the more the familiar comfort of the piano takes the back seat for darker tunes to really set the tone.

[h1] But, naturally, it has its issues as well. [/h1]

I only really have three complaints about the game. The first is the UI; it clearly carries a school theme, and is very clever about how it does so, but it feels a little too... Large. Often concealing the entire torsos of characters, the system window simply feels a little too intrusive. The font, on the other hand, feels entirely out of place. All of the fonts in menus are stylistic and suit the game well, but the actual writing itself is much too simple. It clashes with the soft art style and music, and this is honestly my biggest real complaint.

The final complaint is about one of the characters. [spoiler] Kaede. [/spoiler] Her route just feels entirely out of place and seems to offer no relevant input to the overarching story. This... honestly feels like it was added for the purpose of weak fanservice, if nothing else, to stay true to the game's title. And there really isn't any fanservice to speak for. It was the first route I took and left me with a very incorrect perception of the game. So be wary of that.

But in general, I adore this game. It kept me gripped once I really delved into the main story, and had me constantly "Umm"ing and "Ahhh"ing as new details brought themselves to light as I completed each new route. It's incredibly memorable with... [i]Interesting[/i] endings that come completely out of left field and that each hit like trucks in their own way.

The price tag is hefty, perhaps a little too high for a Visual Novel that lasted me around 20-25 hours (At a guess.) But if you can afford to blow the money on this? You will not be disappointed.

29499963.review:
J'ai mis un pouce rouge pour contre balancer un peu les pouces verts. J'ai apprécié y jouer, mais mon avis reste quand même trop mitigé concernant ce jeu. Au début pas de soucis dans le déroulement de l'histoire, mais par la suite et concernant certaines fins, une certaine amertume ou incompréhension me reste.
Si vous avez les moyens et qu'il vous fait envie, allez-y, mais il vaut mieux attendre les soldes.

Le jeu nous présente Asuka qui tente de réaliser son rêve d'enfance, devenir infirmière. Jusque là pas de problème, on rencontre les différents protagonistes, la vie suit son cours (avec des choix par-ci par-là) et puis bah on choisi la demoiselle dont on veut faire l'arc et je dirais qu'à partir de ce "choix", ce train-train quotidien peut devenir autre chose. No spoil, juste attention à ce que vous attendez de ces histoires, cette VN n'est pas si fleur bleue qu'elle le paraît.

Points positifs :
- les graphismes, les persos sont beaux, les CG aussi
- les musiques, surtout la chanson qui est bien sympa
- Les doublages, un déçue au début par la voix de l'héroïne, mais Sakuya et Itsuki <3
- 3 arcs (sur les 4 proposés par le jeu) ont une histoire, non conventionnelle, originale je dirais

Points négatifs :
- Ces 3 arcs sont assez proches scénaristiquement à quelques moments près
- Ces 3 arcs trop "originaux" à mon goût (sauf peut-être vite fait la bonne fin d'Itsuki)
- Le prix (je me répète, mais attendez clairement les soldes)
- Peut-être un peu court pour le prix

Comptez dans les 20h pour le finir totalement. Si vous regardez mon temps de jeu il est de 19.7 heures et j'ai choisi de poster mon évalution uniquement que lorsque j'aurai totalement fini le jeu (tous les arcs et toutes les fins). 
Je ne pense pas qu'il plaira/conviendra à tous, mais si vous êtes ouvert d'esprit ou êtes du genre à pas trop vous poser de questions, ça devrait le faire.
Au final mon arc préféré doit être le 4eme qui est plus classique par rapport à d'autres VN, il est plus réaliste je dirais.

En espérant que ça éclairera quelques lanternes, tchuss ;)

29213533.review:
Started off nicely with all the existential questions someone would have entering college. What do you want to do with your life and why? Why be a nurse? Each character having their own reason made it interesting for maybe the first two hours.

But then it drags on with a lot of filler dialogue where no character or plot development happens. I think this would be better if it cut down on the silly "whos boobs are bigger" situations that are basically weaboo fanservice. Some reviews, and my experience, were to have an easily fanservicable visual novel actually have some heart and some depth. And yeah it DID...but it was very sprinkled in.

It's weird for me to say,  but I'll say it anyway. When the novelty of college aged lesbian nurses wears off, you're not left with much other than the novelty of college aged lesbian nurses. It's not worth the full price because it's far too dense to enjoy consistently at least in my opinion. What would have made this better is if you got to make more choices sooner to influence the direction of the story, rather than sit through all this pointless dialogue before you can make a single inconsequential choice that doesn't change much.

28860576.review:
避免没玩过的人不小心看到造成剧透，全段隐藏  [spoiler] 故事从主角明日香对“星星” 的追忆与寻找开始，她一开始误以为要找的就是老师枫那样的护士，直到朔夜就出现在眼前。而自己最初的心愿则是永远保护朔夜。
    她不知道每个人都有隐忍的事：妹妹奈绪起初只是为了让她忘记痛苦而让姐姐失忆，直到明日香因为保护奈绪受伤，让她决定从此独自保护不再是那个孩子王的姐姐，慢慢地，这种感情变成了她害怕知道真相的姐姐回到朔夜身边的独占欲。当她为救明日香失去能力，还拼命吃药想恢复。有一天，她对姐姐说，我不能再给你做“痛痛飞走了”  因为已经快到了不再能像现在这么腻在一起的年纪？因为她失去了挽回姐姐能力？都是，但她同时又是那么内疚，因为她所做的，变得不再是为了姐姐好。她们甜到掉牙的恩爱让我想，这俩姐妹在一起多好。一汐小时候只是静静陪伴在朋友们身边，她没有觉得自己被欺负，而是崇拜着欺负她的明日香。本是当年最弱小的一个，为了朔夜不再沉浸于失去明日香的悲痛，将自己改变成那个朔夜喜欢的明日香的样子，做她的女朋友来照顾她。当看到明日香没死，立刻决定退出，曾经的冒失鬼和糊涂虫的身份替换了，不变的是她其实一直喜欢着明日香。在她做的普丽玛游戏里，更无意间流露出她不仅仅是倾慕和想成为明日香那样的意识，或许就是爱吧。为了最好的朋友们的安全，冒着危险加入Lab。但为了明日香，更是明知会被追杀，也要只身摧毁Lab，这也印证明日香对于她，远不止是朋友了吧。相比下来，老师对明日香感情的起源不是一见钟情，而是让她回忆起前女友。说实话，老师的性格，不只是性格，都比其他人更配明日香，这是真正的笨蛋情侣啊，单是从这方面说的话。但是，正如明日香小时候的愿望不仅仅是“当护士”那么简单，在明日香心里最耀眼的则是朔夜，朔夜让她惊得说不出话的美貌之下的严厉、固执，每一个责备都⁮牵动着她的心。正如她意识到的：喜欢一个人未必是在一起有多开心，而是看到她心里就平静不下来吧。故事的GE看来指的是主人公的GE，而其他的GE下，尽管明日香看不到，但没有她那句话，恭子会带着朔夜，朔夜带着没能和明日香说出的愿望死去。所以我选择朔夜，不能放下她不管。
      在十二年前，明日香面对着眼前最珍爱的朔夜承诺：“我要成为护士，保护朔夜”，把手伸向遥远的星空。朔夜也对星星默默在心里许愿：“我要当你的新娘，明日香”。当你看到紧连的两颗星星，也将不得不同时面对它们彼此实则遥不可及的事实。如一汐所说，她是这么多年来最没有变化的人。她对明日香的爱一点没变，看上去因为是千金小姐的威严和对失去记忆的明日香已经不再是因冒失霸道，而是因其迷糊懈怠的责备只是表象，早在当年和明日香同为孤儿时就已打情骂俏如此。她的忍耐与自我折磨不亚于其他人，为了明日香不被恭子伤害，她不知承受了多少痛苦和压抑保持和明日香的距离。但是，心的距离又怎么能改变。优希是明日香在医院实习遇到的绝症病患，没有人比我这样的废柴更理解这样的知己对“水母社社长”明日香来说有多重要，那句“病房的门牌已变成其他人的名字”更是在我心里狠狠挖了一刀。明明朔夜也经历了这样的事，明日香却是偶然才听说。从这里开始就能看出朔夜已经将这些变成习惯。有时忍不住会到楼顶深情吻明日香，试图把那个愿望还给她，有时突然地对逃避的明日香说“我要和你一起成为护士的呀”却不露声色继续克制、远离。只有在明日香夸她时，才忍不住内心的欢喜。就这样，她把心愿也藏到了生命的最后。正如大家共同喜欢着明日香，明日香和恭子共同喜欢着朔夜，恭子那和明日香与奈绪一样的姐妹情愫来得更为偏激，但朔夜心里清楚，正因如此，恭子不会仅仅因为嫉妒而憎恨当年的火灾中没来救自己的明日香，更不会只是因为这样，让那么喜欢明日香的她受着与心爱的人近在咫尺又远在天边的伤害，而是因为，养母的日记所述为真：那天死去的是朔夜，这副身体是恭子的。所以恭子对明日香的恨无法平息，且更害怕与明日香的接触会让自己发现这个事实从而承受现在这种永远离开恭子和明日香的痛苦。直到自己的意识将从恭子身上离开，她才向着心上人袒露了自己的愿望：“我要当你的新娘”，以及现在的另一个心愿：把恭子托付给最重要、最亲近的明日香，让明日香劝服其接受移植手术。当恭子不再不顾一切地施暴让明日香远离自己和朔夜，以冷酷、无理示人的她哭了：明日香怎样都无所谓，她只想和朔夜一起死。“我们结婚吧”“和恭子你”。别说是难以化解的恨，恭子真有可能杀了她。“但这是我最喜欢的朔夜要我做的”，不管你愿不愿意，我就用余下的一生来做给你看。大概是恭子终于察觉到了，口口声声称明日香不配和自己抢，但现在，明日香正在不顾一切要实现朔夜最后的心愿，于是，她也为这些心愿接受了手术，为想和明日香结婚的朔夜挑选婚纱。明日香在和一汐说恭子时想到“朔夜的外表，天使的内心吗？”其实，她们姐妹二人都是这样的呀。结局，她们闪瞎所有人地穿着婚纱，向老师、奈绪和一汐都宣布了喜讯。朔夜知道爱人的难堪，调戏道：好好爱我和恭子——这不算脚踏两只船哦，但明日香发完誓后她又请求道，把恭子的名字去掉来一次吧。是啊，朔夜的意识会到哪去呢？明日香看向刚泛出微弱星光的天空。
      接下来的结局甜到不能再甜了。毕竟朔夜这么爱明日香，姐妹爱好差不远，恭子接受和爱上明日香也只是时间问题。于是最后变成了，带着朔夜意识的女儿和恭子争明日香更爱谁，我想，这个结局不仅是对于朔夜来说最好的GE，对明日香来说也是幸福到无以复加、无可比拟的吧。祝你们两个……不对，三个永远幸福、百年好合哈哈[/spoiler]

28155706.review:
白衣也算steam上著名的百合GAL了 终于玩了一遍感觉多年心愿已了（×）不过就我个人来说，音乐和作画也没有什么特别让我激动的地方，评价一下大概就是合格吧，没有什么多余的好处和坏处。剧情倒是有一些可圈可点的地方。

为了凑点字数尽量让在下拉框藏不起来的地方写点不剧透的。收集到某人的结局后会在小憩一会儿那里出现对应声优的一段个人感想，明日香的声优本人的声音好攻啊2333（虽然我觉得明日香在这作里面处处表现出渣攻本色（×）而且好像说了自己觉得一汐比较好因为是眼镜控233。一汐的声优本人的声音居然感觉还是挺软的。全结局收集之后又会出现明日香的声优的一段话，大概是恭喜大家收集了全结局啥的。另外好像只有枫线里会出现大家穿冬装的样子，虽然就是在秋季的衣服上面套了个外套……

实际上我自己玩的时候一周目打出了单身狗线，我觉得我真是个正直的人啊，好好学习啊谈什么恋爱啊做一个好护士啊对不对，你看谈恋爱这么复杂（我自己都编不下去了（哭。一开始我对老师一见钟情，老师超级天使但是又超级可爱，但是我后面又没怎么发现和老师的互动啊，就后来莫名其妙地觉得妹妹也不错，结果还是稀里糊涂地什么真相都没搞清楚就加冠典礼了就结局了。让我仔细思考了一下我单身至今凄惨的人生。

我总结了一下打出HE的要点就是，为对方着想，相信对方，诚实以待。
这作的BE除了枫线还相对没有那么鬼畜，其余都……wry！？？！我是从奈绪的BE开始收集的，最后我整个人都黑人问号，WTF？！？？想想的话这些BE都有点草率，好好的人怎么忽然就*&……%￥%……&了是吧。但是看一汐的BE的时候我居然觉得有点带感，因为我好想欺负她啊（诚实地说出来了）

对了 在收集相应结局之后回到主页面的标题配音会有对应的不同，比如一汐的BE之后就会出现一汐奄奄一息的声音，我好喜欢啊（完了我发现我根本就是喜欢一汐）

超能力啥的虽然都是老梗，不过我发现这确实是一个可以简化剧情的好方法……

在四个可攻略的人物的剧情里，我个人觉得最有意思的是一汐线和朔夜线。奈绪线也很丰富但是前两个我更喜欢。枫线就是和明日香的过去那些事完全无关的，一开始我想要在这个游戏里玩到的普通恋爱故事，不过我看着攻略打的时候枫线是最后收集的，感觉枫线虽然还行不过单薄了些，当成独立于这个故事以外的恋爱故事也不错。老师真的很可爱啊要不然我怎么对她一见钟情。

然后我想仔细说一下我最喜欢的一汐线和朔夜线。实际上按照整个故事背景，要我选择一个合适的真结局的话（虽然我也不知道判断这个的标准是啥，就是我自己的感觉吧），朔夜线应该是最合理的。

以下剧透
[spoiler]以前看相聚一刻的时候印象最深的场景之一就是五代在响子已故的前夫惣一郎墓前对他说：“我会把你和响子一起娶回家的。” 这时候五代已经接受了响子的一切，包括她依然存在无法消除的对前夫的思念。从此我就觉得婚姻的成立应该是双方已经准备好为对方奉献一切，毫无保留，毫无障碍。在朔夜线HE里明日香接受了朔夜的一切，心情明朗地准备好了接受恭子，准备好了怀着共同的对朔夜的爱和思念，和她一起共度余生。怎么说呢这就是通常所说的情敌相见分外恩爱吗（×）。选择恭子是正确的，因为朔夜无论如何都会死亡，在剩下的人生里，是选择一个人怀念朔夜还是和另一个一起怀念朔夜并且对那个人像对朔夜一样满怀爱意呢，而且明日香也不是没有喜欢上过恭子，平时的朔夜应该也夹杂的恭子的人格，而且恭子也很可爱啊！（顺便我超想看恭子拿电击枪电一汐的样子，感觉会很棒（被打死））最后明日香实现了多年以前的约定，并且大家都没有忘记过去，结束了这些后开始了全新的生活，所有的结都解开了。以及妹子和妹子居然可以生孩子了究竟是怎么做到的啊！而且我觉得一汐和奈绪很配啊，普通的抱怨会讲两小时电话吗，我好想看她们的故事啊www

对了其实我在一汐线里喜欢上了朔夜，之前还没有太大的感觉。朔夜打人的样子好迷人啊好想被她掴巴掌啊。我是先通了一汐线再看朔夜线的，感到非常愉悦（×	

其实我一开始也没有怎么喜欢一汐，打了她的线以后觉得她好可爱，这个HE也是最充满恋爱酸臭味的，我也想她们被马踢啊（×
其实一汐才是所有人物里最大的笨蛋。怎么会有这种对待事情这么认真，一心一意地想要完成自己想做的事情，想要保护朔夜，对自己的愿望却无法明说，无法排解的笨蛋啊，这样会让人一下子喜欢上她的啊。一汐是在认真地对待朔夜，认真地对待明日香，害怕着伤害别人，只有害怕认真地对待自己。想要变成明日香也是她的对明日香的爱意和怀念的表现方式，不过的确托她的福，至少一汐变得开朗了起来，虽然还是有点让人生气。看到这一点我觉得很欣慰啊！最后也算是一汐和明日香转换了角色（转换了攻受？！）这种展开真的超级好玩，嘿嘿嘿嘿嘿嘿。最后大家都能获得幸福就好了。顺便说一句其实有一个场景就是朔夜扇了一汐两巴掌以后一汐冲出门之前两个人还在互相深沉地说“喜欢你哦“，之后两人就分居了，各自做着各自的事情，这真是我超级喜欢的模式，不过一汐和朔夜按照故事背景来说还不算是真的恋人吧，虽然比如在奈绪线里，一汐和朔夜发展成互相扶持并且萌生出新的爱情也是完全有可能的，但是首先要解开明日香这个结，完成各自的结之后又能重新和对方在一起了吧，我相信在重新遇到明日香之前这两个人的确是相爱的，只不过还不是完全体形态。果然明日香是万恶之源啊，小时候是渣攻长大了就要补偿小时候的罪孽啊！好气啊！我小时候也很会闹很渣的！为什么我就没有泡到那么多姑娘啊！
[/spoiler]

最后我们还是来讨论一下攻受发色比例这个亘古不变的话题好了（被叉出去）

26642501.review:
Really enjoyed this game. I only play visual novels if they're yuri, so I obviously haven't played that many that I really liked. This game just blew my mind.

I used a walkthrough to get all the endings, and the bad endings are really something. I cried a few times due to them, but they also make the good endings so much more appreciated. 

At the beginning the story was a bit filler-y for me, and I got a little bored, but once you get further in, the story is absolutely mesmerizing. Definitely worth every tear I shed. Sakuya's good ending is my favorite, and surprisingly I cried the most even though it was a good ending. 

I've finished the game, and although I feel empty inside, the music remains in my head and I think I will forever remember this experience as a great one.

13小时全线通关，于是来评价。

就 ADV 而言算是短小精悍的那种。主要卖点在清水百合，人设以及 CV。尤其是加隈亚衣妹妹声线简直不能更棒。CV 都是有功底的一看列表就知道了。

官方中文 ADV 无论怎么样也要支持一个。希望以后会有越来越多 ADV 厂加进来这个行列。希望以后能越来越多。

25540656.review:
Spoiler-Filled Video Review Here!
https://youtu.be/wwLEFYdtWT8

Overall I found this story quite entertaining. The characters have a nice amount of meat to them, and the twists are thrown out rather consistently.

Complaints come primarily with the decision system. Typically, we're given only two choices, and more often than naught it's a false-dichotomy, a 'but thou must' scenario. Other times, we're given choices that don't clearly telegraph their imput on the story, and while I generally applaud unconventional game functions, this is a story that needed some better indication of what choices did what, or at least an indication of the moral weight behind the choice (especially given how plentiful the vapid choices crop up). This is an afterthought, for the most part, but it is still quite grating to get a bad ending for choosing to have the character ask a rather mundane question.

The only other complaint is that the breaks between chapters are too far and few between. We get interludes between scenes, but the story doesn't feel like it has too many natural conclusion points, which make the events drag on and on. It would be nice for the game to say "You can put the story down if you want, go rest your eyes" from time to time. I'm not looking for an immersion breaking prompt, just a title card that says "Chapter End" or something so I feel like I have a natural bookmark instead of leaving with a plotline half-resolved.

But those are minor gripes to what is ultimately a pretty well written and produced visual novel. I give a recommendation for those who are speed readers, fans of yuri, and people looking to be thrown for a loop every twenty minutes or so.

25006920.review:
Realmente no se por donde empezar, pero cada aspecto del juego es genial y lo hacen realmente disfrutable.

Podria empezar hablando sobre las Seiyuus, El cual era un buen grupo de Veteranas y bien conocidas y con bastante experiencia con Excepcion de Kukama-San que es virtualmente nueva con no más de 4 años desde su debut, pero a pesar de eso, su papel como Nao fue increible y muy bien interpretado. Por otra lado tenemos a voces tan bien conocidas como Azumi Asakura, Tamura Yukari, Asami Imai y Hara Yumi, Estas ultimas dos cantando el Opening y Ending respectivamente del juego. 

Empezando con Asakura-San la cual con su dulce y suave tono de voz fue capaz de darle ese aire despreocupado e infantil a Asakura, pero cuando era necesario podia ajustar su voz para meter la seriedad necesaria en las escenas donde se necesitaba. Tamura-San tambien interpreto de manera increible y majestuosa su papel como Ojou-Sama, su voz firme y seria pero que por momentos se volvia dulce e infantil es una de lás mejores cosas en su persona, Hara-San con su voz tan flexible y versatil (Quienes conozcan la voz normal de Hara-San sabran a lo que me refieron) fue capaz de darle ese aire atractivo de Ikemen a su personaje y por Ultimo Imai-San, en lo personal su voz es una de mis favoritas siendo capaz de darle naturalmente ese Aire de Onee-san a su personaje con su voz suave pero seria lo cual hacia adorable a su personaje.

La banda sonora era muy buena, y los temas encajaban perfectamente con el aire de las escenas, aunque algo que en lo personal no me agrado fue como de repente cambiaban el OST de una escena triste al OST de una escena normal o a musica más alegre de la nada, lo cual hacia un poco anti-climatico el cambio entre escenas, pero de ahi enfuera la banda sonora fue increible y hermosa.

Ya para terminar me gustaria hablar sobre el Estilo de arte que usaron, que en mi opinion es hermoso, exquisito, uno de los mejores que he visto hasta el momento, la forma de grabar simbolicamente el mensaje detras de la imagen, es increible, especialmente esa imagen del primer beso entre Asuka y Sakuya es demasiado hermosa.

Asi que en general mi puntuacion seria.

Plot: 9
Visual: 9
Banda Sonora: 9
Personajes: 10+

24912421.review:
由於我沒有玩過前作，所以我不太清楚前作到底是怎樣。
但簡而言之，我會這樣認為，雖然遊戲本身是以『看護學校』和『護士』作為題材
故事雖然是有『看護學校』和『護士』為題的相關描寫，但卻不是故事的主題。

由於各個角色的背景和角色線的劇情均與此無關。所以以『護士』為題的角度而言，有點虎頭蛇尾的感覺。
特別是和『護士』相關的描寫在共通線卻是非常多，而描寫也有點深入。
而後續的劇情與此無太大關係，以致令人有種違和感。

本作不存在甚麼主線，但的確有其共通的核心元素和重點，並以此為題發展出不同角色的路線故事
這個重點就是大幸明日香和其他角色『以前』的關係，為免影響觀感就不在此劇透太多。
在看之前我以為最終故事會很相似，只是過程和細節不同。但事實上故事發展都很不同
同時在共通線會產生各種謎團，基本上讀者是需要看完所有角色路線才能夠得知這些謎團背後的真相
只看單一路線會留下不少不解之謎令人感到不足
從而有一種令我有一種動力想去追看其他角色路線，去查看『到底發生甚麼事』
而最後故事也有很好地解明了所有謎團。
是我覺得劇本寫得不錯的其中之一個地方。

共通線的劇情大致就是大幸明日香在看護學校一年級的生活，
除了一眾Gal Game都有的老樣子角色介紹 ：即是主角和不同女性角色的交流以外
也有伏筆：即是上面提到的各種謎團和故事共通的核心元素和重點。
以及上面提到的『護士』相關的描寫。
共通線由這3部份主要組成。而女主角的出場率則是由選項決定
根據選擇，共通線會出現相應女主角的獨特劇情。所以建議別直接用『跳到下一個選項』。

雖然前後劇情主題不一帶來違和感，角色之間的感情描寫略為不足
而很簡單用『回憶』這個理由帶過所有需要進行角色性格和關係描寫的位置
是其很嚴重的缺點。

但儘管如此，也有出色的地方，『護士』這個要素的描寫略為深入
在共通線的描寫就足以令人初步了解護士的職責，功用和重擔
角色線方面，也有不少的角色線劇情寫得不錯，該燃的地方燃得起來
該感動的地方也做得感人。日常劇做得平凡而不沉悶，帶有笑點。
對於百合愛好者而言，百合元素相當充足，不是流於輕百合日常劇的作品
加上難得是Steam首次有官方中文化Gal Game上架，還是百合向。

百合愛好者其實絕對值得一玩（單是奈緒線已經值回票價...）

24828605.review:
I'll start with the big con:

Translation standard is not up to par. Compared with Mangagamer's Yurirei (Kindred Spirits) and SonoHana (A Kiss for the Petals), it's not even close. In almost every scene this game has voice clips spilling over into multiple text boxes, general spelling and grammar errors (fixed now in a language patch), awkward phrases everywhere (the worst of both the literal and liberal translation worlds). The bonus seiyuu messages are not subbed. The medical glossary was completely cut from the English and Chinese versions. The OP and ED are not subbed. While Yurirei did not have anything like the medical glossary, it had a subbed OP and ED, as well as full translated lyrics for the insert song "A. A. Ai". Subjectively, I preferred Mangagamer's much more weeb translation style of Yurirei and SonoHana anyway. If this game was originally slated to release a month ago, Nao calling her Onee-chan "Asky" must be only the beginning of the abomination that was the script they had at the original release date.
The localization, imo, is the biggest letdown of the game and the biggest roadblock to the game actually being worth $34-$40 USD. If this game had been localized by Mangagamer, and with all the effort of Yurirei's and SonoHana's localizations put together (ahem, actually fitting each voice clip into one text box), with bonus feelies like an MP3/FLAC soundtrack (I cannot find the soundtrack uploaded on the internet, and having to convert the .bgm files in the game folders is an inconvenience), subbed everything, and some translated bonus stories outside the game (yes, they exist), then the game would make a much better case for costing almost as much as Yurirei and SonoHana put together.

Now (Nao) I'll try and narrate my experience with this game.

The only thing I like more than yuri is cars, so by not-so-coincidence a random Eurobeat song from Initial D popped into my head whenever I got excited playing Yurirei and it stuck the whole time I was playing it. "I Just Wanna Call You Nao"

The song came back with a vengeance. Excitement levels shot through the roof (or should I say, shot through the Okujou...)

This isn't to say the game's soundtrack is bad. It's quite good. For example, they really nailed the feel of Nao's theme 癒しのおでこ (Healing Forehead). It definitely has that domestic feel to it; I can easily imagine Asuka's walking into the dorm and Nao's peering out of the kitchen and dropping the "Okaeri, Onee-chan!" as I listen. 

For some reason, one of the routes is more or less completely disconnected from the other 3 girls', while the other 3 are so interconnected they all leave huge questions that you had to play another of their routes to answer. The 3 routes also have a ton of repeated scenes between each other, reducing the game's effective length.

Sound and graphics:

Localization aside, this is a huge upgrade from Yurirei in terms of production value. Everyone is fully voiced, even some of the minor characters like Yuki-chan and the Machi-Michi Combi. Ironically, even though it was Imai Asami (Kaede) and Tamura Yukari (Sakuya) being in the game that pushed me over the edge to splash $40 minus the 15% discount to buy it, neither of the girls were even in my top 3 (including Asuka). Nao's seiyuu puts a noticeable squeak into her character's voice (I won't say it's bad, just sayin'), but Asuka's does a really bang-up job injecting some energy, comic relief and witty banter that I really missed in Yurirei's MC Yuna (While Hina is my favorite character in Yurirei, she wasn't very outwardly energetic or clever either, [spoiler]making their couple a bit of a downer[/spoiler]). She has the zaniness that reminds me of Neptune from the Neptune series, being a lazy, silly Onee-chan, but Asuka's character can actually feel hurt and grieve, and she really does love and appreciate her imouto; as a result, Asuka's character is much more round and deep than Nepko's.

The game is in glorious HD. The art is much more "flavorful" than Yurirei's: while Yurirei has a more "realistic", muted and brown and baggy look to it, this game has a much more typical colorful exaggerated "anime" style like SonoHana. Just look at their colorful hair and sick eyelash game.

This game may not have porn, but it's got nice fanservice.

It's not technically perfect though. The art's biggest weakness is hands and feet. It also has a bad case of "cheeky mouth", where in side view the characters' mouths creep over to the side of their face. The ugliest offense the art commits is the occasional time where the eyes drift too wide and too low on the face, committing possibly the greatest sin in anime artwork: the "kawaii uguu" face.

Another area where this game has that exaggerated "anime" style making it closer to SonoHana than Yurirei is the melodrama. Instead of semi-realistically tackling homophobia like Yurirei, this game takes place in a world where girls loving girls is the most normal thing in the world, and dodges even mentioning the words "lesbian" or "gay". It gets much, much wackier and more supernatural than both of them put together though. Itsuki's and Sakuya's bad ends would make Nitroplus and "Urobutcher" Urobuchi Gen proud.

In closing, this a very interesting and flavorful yuri VN with a much different taste than Yurirei, while at least providing much more story content than that one SonoHana VN available on Steam (I'd go so far as to say it's about as long as every SonoHana VN ever fully translated, put together) right now. I enjoyed it. It's a refreshing twist from the relative blandness of Yurirei. But because of its crappy localization and not being as long as Yurirei, it's a hard sell at $34-$40. [b]Wait for a sale.[/b] If Michael no Otome-tachi, the first real full-length SonoHana game, ever gets a full Mangagamer localization and release at $34 after discounts or less, it will steal a ton of thunder from this game. But until then, this game has certainly carved out its niche within a niche as a yuri VN with 4 routes, each with a different pretty girl to romance, very nice art, music and voice acting, and high doses of both cuteness and craziness.

24787711.review:
First, I’ll give a note on the price.  Yes, it's more expensive than your average visual novel but it's also significantly longer than your average visual novel.  Also, every line by a character is voiced, even minor characters.  You’re paying for something with significantly more effort and resources poured into it than your average $10 visual novel that takes a few hours to beat.

Another Note for potential buyers: Even vague hints about the story can blunt the surprise this game provides.  So if you like being surprised, stop reading any reviews right now.  Buy it right now or wishlist it for later but don't read any reviews until you're done the game.

***
Vague spoilers that still may ruin things ahead.
***
***
***

So the first think you might think by looking at the marketing is that this is a fluffy yuri story about nurses, and to a large extent, yes, it is.  However, it’s hiding another side to it that's not so apparent.  A side that's darker and a great deal stranger.  This side takes a reader by surprise but you can look back and realize there were hints of this.  The routes themselves can vary in how strange they want to take things.  Kaede's route is very grounded while Sakuya's route is at the other end of the scale.  Also, the squeamish amongst the players might want to avoid some of the bad endings (particularly Itsuki’s).

When I played it, and came across the first major plot twist two thirds of the way in, I was blown away and left wondering “What happened to this cute game about nurses I was playing?” and then things kept getting stranger.  It was a heck of a trip that constantly made me wonder how I was supposed to feel about the things that were happening.  Of course that was probably a good sign as that was kind of like some of my favourite anime series.

On some other positive notes, the art style stays quite consistently good.  The four different routes in terms of their relationship dynamics play out fairly differently giving some variety.  The main character, Asuka can even be considered a different person after each of them.  The music is decent, although nothing jumped out at me as being amazing.  Even though the game can be disturbing, it’s not doing it in a way that’s punching down at disenfranchised groups.

However, let’s also bring up some of the bad points this game.  Some parts of Nurse Love Addiction are left not translated such as the voice actor commentary, the credits, and a glossary that details a bit of the world lore.  If you want to play the game without a walkthrough, a handful of the choices are counter-intuitive so it may require some trial and error to get a desired ending.  There are also some plot holes or at least things that are left unexplained regarding Itsuki’s and Sakuya’s bad endings.

I definitely recommend Nurse Love Addiction to a yuri fan that wants to walk a bit on the stranger side of things.  Also, I guess I recommend it to a yuri fan that doesn’t like the stranger side of things that buys the game on a discount to only play Kaede’s route.  At any rate, this game gets a plus from me.

Edit: The credits are now translated with a game patch but weren't when I initially wrote this review.

24697827.review:
So I have literally just finished all of the routes in this game, and I’m happy to say it does not disappoint in the slightest, which is very relieving considering I checked this games store page every day from the moment it appeared on steam to the day it was released. 

Needless to say I hope to see more of Kogado’s games appear on steam in the future.

From a technical standpoint the game is beautiful, with a wonderfully detailed art-style and many gorgeous pictures, each character is unique and distinctive with a variety of expression that seem very animated for lack of a better term, there were times when I almost thought I was watching an anime. And the soundtrack is incredible, as usual I find my favourite piece is the gorgeous opening track but the rest of the music is nothing to sneeze at and keeps the atmosphere going throughout the entire story. And of course this game is fully voice acted (apart from one or two moments when there didn’t seem to be a voice to the dialogue, though thankfully that was only for a few ‘huh’ and ‘yeah’ bits, and there’s always the chance that I accidentally skipped it). The voices all match the characters wonderfully, really bringing each of their personalities to life.

Speaking of which, that brings me to the meat of this game: the story and characters. If I had to choose a single word that described my feelings on this it would be… real. Which is kind of ridiculous considering the utter insanity that the story keeps bringing with each decision. I’m not even kidding, this game doesn’t do plot-twists it does whiplash! I have half predicted about two things throughout all of the routes, and even then the validation didn’t come immediately, and you are not just dealing with your everyday drama when it comes to this game. But it all works because everything does feel real. The characters, the decisions, the consequences. I think that’s what threw me off the most, everything has some kind of consequence. I mean, look at your four romantic interests. You can pick from: Your sister, your teacher, and one of two girls who are already in a relationship… with each other. Just from that line-up you can instantly start coming up with every possible problem pursuing any of these characters. But it all works wonderfully to make an interesting and fully developed story no matter which way you go, and I really did find myself connecting to everyone involved. Asuka is a great protagonist who makes mistakes, but you love seeing how she pushes herself to achieve her dreams, and no matter who you choose there will be at least one adorable romantic moment that just makes you smile from ear to ear.

I won’t spoil any of the routes, you do need to experience this as blindly as possible, though I will say that you will not be prepared for how bad the bad endings can go. The only other thing I want to mention is the presentation of nurses themselves. I’ve never had any interest whatsoever in nursing, either learning it for a career or even reading about it, yet the story goes into a lot of details about the training and tasks for each of the students and each new thing they learned really caught my attention. I was fascinated by all that they learned and all the theory behind it, it’s actually given me a whole new appreciation of nursing as a whole and certainly makes me want to learn more about it, if only for my own interest.

I cannot recommend Nurse Love Addiction enough, it’s a must-have for fans of romance visual novels with developed characters, an interesting yet unpredictable story and wonderful presentation. If you don’t like Yuri you may not be into it, but I’d say even then it’s worth trying.

Also Itsuki is my new Waifu.

I have no regrets.

24670631.review:
[url=https://azusantiara.com/2016/08/02/nurse-love-addiction-review/]Click here for full review with images etc[/url]

Developed by KOGADO STUDIO and published by Degica on steam. Nurse Love Addiction or 白衣性愛情依存症 [Hakuisei Aijou Izonshou] in Japanese. Looks like your typical “cute girls doing cute things” yuri visual novel filled with moe and romance. It also has the touch of mystery and plot twist which really surprised me as I did not expect them at all. Nurse Love addiction has a total of 9 endings [bad ends included] for you to get which are determined by your choices you make in game. It should last you around 20 – 30 hours. As for me I took 20 hours to do a full completion of the game.

[h1]Thoughts On The Story[/h1]
As for me I did Oosachi Nao route first, and I was pleasantly surprised, because of how the game presents itself to you as a sweet yuri visual novel but instead it has unexpected plot twists. So having mystery getting into the mix the plot gets shrouded in mystery instantly but has good foreshadowing of the plot and character backgrounds which makes it an even more enjoyable read. When I was playing through the routes I found myself very curious of the plot and it kept me guessing what is the plot? How are the characters connected to each other? What causes a specific event to occur? It kept me interested throughout the play through, It was something that I wanted to get more details on, and this game definitely delivered. And wow Nao is really a good little sister.:) I would want a little sister like this.

As for the characters I like the protagonists the most which is Oosachi Asuka provably because her personality resembles me in a way and her character develops with the progression of the route and you can see how she grows to be a more mature person as a whole. She is a simple, relaxed, fluffy and somewhat sluggish older sister. She’s not dumb, but her memory could use some work. In general, she’s pretty much hopeless, but she has a knack for being loved by others. When it really counts, her ability to get things done and decisiveness shines through.

The story is detailed as it managed to answer most of your questions you have that you get on your mind during first play through and the school life is extremely accurate like our characters getting flooded with homework for summer. Do note that the routes are planned in a way that you have to complete all of the routes in order to witness the events unfold beautifully as it answers your questions slowly, route by route.

[h1]To sum up[/h1]
Will I recommend this ? Simple answer is yes. I would definitely recommend this visual novel if you are the type of person who likes yuri, extremely unexpected plot twist and nurses! Of course! It’s even in the title!

最初看到这个游戏时：哼，我才不会因为画风还不错就买买买呢（￣へ￣）
然后：上次看到那个画风美美哒的游戏叫啥来着(ﾟДﾟ≡ﾟдﾟ)!?

在攻略的帮助下终于推完了，为了逃脱校园线的收束可是被狠狠捅了几十次呢(;¬_¬)

总结一下好了：
首先本作包含以下元素，轻微剧透：魔法少女，两人一机，转生，鬼[strike] 父[/strike]母，NTR，猎奇，SM，秀色，CP交换，COSPLAY，剧毒百合，皇家狗粮
一个画风如此清丽的游戏有如此之多的属性，由此可见工画堂满满的诚意（笑）

画风 9/10
这个画风应该能满足多数人的审美吧。

剧本 2/10
我要好好批评一下这个剧本，为了摆脱校园结局的收束被捅了几十刀是我的错咯？说起来我是原价入的游戏，看在百合的面子上姑且让智商下线不提剧本里一些荒诞的设定。在只有寥寥5个主要角色的情况下我想这个价格怎么着也得给每个角色分配一堆事件来铺垫吧，然而被捅着捅着我慢慢明白了：这个游戏是讲的一个大故事，然后在攻略每个角色时你只能看到其中的一部分。这确实是节约了花费在脚本上的精力，然而我确是要为一个如此高水准作画却如此偷工减料脚本的游戏感到不值。
典型的剧本围绕人设转，为了人设属性强行出了这么个牵强的故事，难道找个好点的十来万字的脚本剧作家辣么难？

音乐 6/10
只有两三首BGM能说都是中上之选，其余的完全无法给人耳目一新的感觉，突出事件突然性或者焦急感的曲子有些嘈杂。不过综合来看好歹没太拖游戏后腿，给个及格分吧。

配音 8/10
老实说自己GALGAME玩得还算多，但说实话对这方面研究不多。在这个作品中能充分感受到一些小场景里抑扬顿挫的情绪声调，这点很不错。不过除了女主姐妹外其它角色的笑有时还是显得不够自然。

系统 1/10
这是20年前[strike] 心跳回忆[/strike]的UI设计吗？美工是谁明天不用来了！稍微用点心会死啊！菜单里羽毛，藤蔓，花朵，水晶宝石这类的装饰一概没有，完全没有优雅的感觉，只让人觉得粗糙。

价格4/10
出了卡和背景我给6-8分，本身也是为此买的游戏，也没算多么地失望。目前这个行业貌似很难混，有高度符合审美需求的作画就该谢天谢地了。

24491517.review:
Хочу предупредить, это не та игра, где все абсолютно мило и невинно. Начинается все мило и банально, но потом история становится темнее. В игре есть кровь, пугающие моменты, драма и сверестесвенные способности (Причем это зависит от ваших решений в игре).

Мужчин здесь нет. Ни одного персонажа мужского пола. No Man's Sky. No Man's Nurse Love Addiction.

Количество развилок огромно. Проиграть нереально легко. Да, в этой новелле можно проиграть, причем плохих концовок больше чем хороших. Некоторые могут Вас шокировать или оставить в недоумении.
Так как это юри новелла, Вам предстоит выбрать себе подружку, причем Вы можете положить глаз на свою милашку-сестру. Всего 4 романтических интереса, 4 хорошие концовки и около 5-ти плохих. Если вы будите играть без руководства (Оно есть в сообществе на английском), то вы скорее всего получите концовку, где вы не смогли сладить не с кем. Использовать гайд РЕКОМЕНДУЕТСЯ.

НЕ ПРОХОДИТЕ "NAO" РУТ САМЫМ ПЕРВЫМ! Этот рут координально меняет жанр и смысл всех событий в новелле. Это все что я могу сказать без спойлеров. Оставьте этот рут на следующее прохождение, а лучше на самое последнее, если вам понравилась новелла. Я желею что начал этот рут со второго прохождения, а не оставил на потом.

"Все не так, как это выглядят", "Будь осторожна с ней". Это вы услышите по мере прохождения. Вы не будите придавать этому значение. Возможно для Вас будет какая-то интрига, но то что происходит на самом деле, насколько главная героиня и её окружение окутаны тайной (очень тёмной тайной), вы даже не представите.

1) Новелла очень длинная, я убил минимум 6 часов на один рут, причем позволял себе скипать некоторые моменты (Каюсь. Английский не всегда даётся легко).
2) Музыка не шик, но она нужна для атмосферы (Особенно когда происходят неожиданные повороты)
3) Черт побери, как же хорошо все нарисованно! Персонажи сильно отличаются внешне друг от друга. Например в "Kindred spirits on the roof" персонажи ужасно похожи.
4) 18+ сцен там нет (не считая крови). Присутвуют моменты когда герои не только целуются, но никакой эротики нет. Все только на словах. А, стоп. Поцелуи же эротикой считаются?

Лично у меня ползли мурашки по коже от внезапного показа насилия в этой новелле. Я честно ожидал миленькую новеллу про розовых девочек)
Главная героиня возможно Вам понравится меньше всех, ибо она наивная, добрая, неуклюжая девочка, в отличии от других героев. В каждом руте раскрывается определенный персонаж и мазайка постепенно собирается. 

Если я не разжег в Вас интерес к этой новелле, то вот ряд интересных моментов (СПОЙЛЕРОВ!) 

ОСТРОЖНО СПОЙЛЕРЫ!
[spoiler] Главная героиня не помнит своё дество и не помнит почему она мечтает стать мед.сестрой. Потому что... ОНА ПОТЕРЯЛА ПАМЯТЬ! НЕ ПО СВОЕЙ ВОЛЕ! [/spoiler] 

[spoiler] Когда главная героиня видит Итски и Сакую, она их не знает, но они знают её прекрасно. ОНИ ПРИТВОРЯЮТСЯ ЧТО НЕ ЗНАЮТ ЕЁ. Они знают её много лет. Другую её.[/spoiler]

[spoiler] Главную героиню тут могут ударить, избить, похитить, проткнуть ножом и попытаться изнасиловать. (Забавляет остуствие мужчин. Все это делают девушки). [/spoiler]

[spoiler] Герои новеллы в дестве были "лабораторными крысами". У них пытались выявить паронормальные способности. У них это получилось! [/spoiler]

[spoiler] Когда у Аски болит голова, Нао (её сестра) проводит некий "ритуал", как они сами его назвали. После него у Аски проходит головная боль. Они прижимаются лбами друг к другу и Нао читает какое-то заклиние. Это выгдят очень мило и глупо. Жаль что на деле все не мило и за этим милым ритуалом кроется большее. [/spoiler]

[spoiler] Аска - главная героиня, которая живет со своей сестрой по имени Нао, как это показано в самом начале, но...
ОНА СИРОТА! У НЕЁ НИКОГДА НЕ БЫЛО СЕСТРЫ! [/spoiler]

[spoiler] Нао - садомазохистка. В одной из концовок главная героиня пытает её и сексуально унижает. [/spoiler]

[spoiler] В игре есть шутка про доту, даже две шутки. Хватит читать спойлеры! [/spoiler]

ОСТРОЖНО СПОЙЛЕРЫ!

꼬마 마법사 파르페 시리즈를 제작했던 코가도의 연애 시뮬레이션 게임 백의성 연애 증후군의 후속작 백의성 애정 의존증(Nurse Love Addiction)입니다.

제목에서 유추할 수 있듯 간호사 및 간호학교 학생들이 주인공인 게임이며 여동생과 같이 간호학교에 입학한 주인공이 여동생을 포함한 학생들 및 교사들과 일정 수준 이상의 썸을 탄다는 내용으로 나쁘지 않은 CG와 배경음, 괜찮은 스토리, 여캐들간의 애정 표현, 여캐들간의 유사 성행위등을 장점으로 들 수 있는 게임입니다.

보통 간호사들은 일생을 의롭게 살며 열정적인 헌신을 선보여줌으로써 죽어가던 사람도 살리는 분들로 우리에게 알려져 있는데 이 게임의 간호사들도 열정적인 키스 및 유사 성행위를 선보여줌으로써 죽어가던 저의 성기능을 살려주었으므로 게임의 주제의식에 걸맞는 메세지와 기능을 담은 게임으로써 가치가 있는 게임이라 생각됩니다.

다만 이 게임을 통해 상기한 이런저런 의료혜택을 받을 수 있는 것과는 다르게 의료보험이 적용되지 않아서인지 게임의 가격이 비싼 것이 단점이므로(정가 43,000원) 관심이 있으시다면 할인을 기다리는게 나을 듯 합니다.

24456335.review:
This game would make Gen Urobochi proud.

At first this seem like a very cute yuri game, and it is for the most part. Until you get to the character specific routes and the bad endings, then the holy shit quotient hit the fans. 

If you really don't want to see any grotesque stuff and just want to enjoy the yuri then for the love of god don't get the bad endings or you'll really regret it.

If you don't mind stuff like [spoiler]cheating, sexual abuse, necrophilia, and cannibalism[/spoiler] then go ahead and enjoy everything.

All in all, a great game for yuri fans, even if it is a bit extreme. My only gripe is that the translation can be lacking at times, and not everything is fully translated.

是白衣！性。。 呸
  不好意思，是白衣性♪爱情♪依存症，简称白爱。27小时通关+1小时回顾鉴赏，really enjoyable！いや，
much more enjoyable than I had expected  ヾ(o◕∀◕)ﾉヾ  快说，白恋什么时候出！！！！！
  一开始我以为，又是一部花吻，买买买，并且准备感受一下急需胰岛素是怎么样的感觉，然而这故事跌宕起伏，研究所，超能力，儿时记忆，青梅竹马（然而我猜测老师也和研究所有关，可惜没猜中），重点 さくや：妈妈，我要和你抢妈妈
  整理一下，略含剧透，没通关的请不要看哦 [spoiler] 妹妹なお喜欢姐姐あすか，さくや喜欢あすか,いつき喜欢あすか，但是さくや和いつき在一起，老师かえで以为被前女友甩了喜欢あすか。あすか则是攻略所有人（罪孽深重的女人啊）。个人线中なお和いつき貌似有好感，いつき线中なお和さくや貌似有姬情。BE则是细思恐极啊，あすか黑化程度 かえで＜ なお＜ さくや＜いつき ，分别是变成小三，性虐，恋尸，食人。。。	[/spoiler] 有中文简直赞，虽然只是繁中，但是不是机翻，为什么这么说呢，你感受一下文本就知道了，有些翻译相当喜感，极具特色，当时有一个翻译我本想举例拿出来说，但是忘了（原谅我渣记性）。什么，有人站出来说这是机翻！我跪下求分享...
  白爱总的来说是部不错的作品，也存在很多上升的空间，足以使其成为神作。虽然BGM单独拿出来听和其他的作品存在差距，但还是可以的，附我很喜欢OP和ED，在文本上有着个人感觉的不足。我觉得嘛，还需要20小时的文本量来完善故事，也许会有人嫌太长，但都沉迷于此了也不在乎多那么一些小时。共通线和BE不需，但是个人线确确实实可以增加，例如小时候的故事可以更加完善，多写一些妹妹和あすか的小时候的事情，虽然也有起名+护妹剧情，但是多一些故事多一些触动，积累起来可以在最后爆发出强烈情感。或者说吧某个故事写的更长，更详细一些也是可以的。いつき小时候的故事也是可以扩展的，让我们感受下你为何会如此爱上あすか。然后我觉得最需要扩展的则是老师线的故事，这也太意犹未尽了吧，我还是很期待有个大故事所以留到最后了。游戏结局感觉是BE和GE，我觉得还可以增加每个人的NE和TE，当然这只是说说容易啦。以上仅仅为个人意见，我只能提供感受，但是我自己是写不了的，当然这些意见现在已经没什么用，但是还是让我尽情像あすか一样吐槽一下。。。。。。不要打我（抱头蹲防）
  田村大魔王还用说吗，其他人都好棒，尤其喜欢あすか的吐槽和妹妹宠溺的声音。对了我好像忘了说，百合大法好！我有一个梦想，希望这个游戏能够动画化，动画化！动画化！  （ 我这人要求真多，前面意见提出一大堆，有些还可能不太恰当。为了防止大家误解我对这部作品不满意，我用想要动画化来表达自己对于此作的无限热爱！）
  







 每完成一个结局，进入标题界面的声音会变，我最后一个是老师的GE，求告知如何更改吗。

24373864.review:
人生第一次评测，献给此作！
那么在点评之前，先分享一些个人觉得很有趣的东西吧：

官网BLOG中有一些比较有趣的内容，这里列出几个个人认为挺有意思的页面：
[url=http://hakuai.kogado.com/blog/863/]さくや（sakuya）线后日谈[/url]
[url=http://hakuai.kogado.com/blog/961/]なお（nao）线后日谈[/url]
[url=http://hakuai.kogado.com/blog/793/]游戏的一些小花絮[/url]
[url=http://hakuai.kogado.com/blog/845/]游戏中的一些细节（主要是[spoiler]屋顶上被捅[/spoiler]的相关内容）[/url]
[url=http://hakuai.kogado.com/blog/838/]游戏BGM相关[/url]

[url=http://pan.baidu.com/s/1eSJkaVC]后日谈广播剧（与官网BLOG的内容不同）[/url]
密码：aiwu

以上，欢迎懂日语的各位去看一看听一听，感觉后日谈好甜好甜啊！！！


接下来是真正的评测：
首先，画风无可挑剔，立绘和CG都是一看就喜欢上了！哎呀这个感觉，就是一见钟情啊！听说要发售就决定无论多贵也要买了，结果实际价格比想象中的要便宜，那更得买了啊！买到之后超开心！！！
再来，配音也是超级棒！一开始压根没听出来あすか（asuka）的cv是浅仓杏美，是在下修行不足……不过cv好厉害！作为主角的cv应该挺辛苦的吧23333而且さくや的cv是御三家之一的田村ゆかり哦！油咖喱就是神啊！！！话说[spoiler]さくや和きょうこ（kyouko）之间的声线转换也超棒，さくや线BE结尾后念标题的声音简直让我欲罢不能！[/spoiler]另外三位我就没有那么熟悉了，不过在本作中表现也都超级棒啊！完全可以最小化游戏，然后开着自动播放当成有声故事听，光是听着就是一种享受啊！
（额外说一句，系统音效简直666666）
音乐部分的话，见到有评论说有些地方BGM很不合适，个人倒是没有这种感觉……硬要说的话，顶多就一两处感觉有一点奇怪，总的来说没有任何问题！顺便网易云音乐有OST哦，专辑：[url=http://music.163.com/#/album?id=3162000]白衣性愛情依存症 オリジナルサウンドトラック[/url]；此外网易云上还有OP和ED，OP：[url=http://music.163.com/#/song?id=32364450]Sunny Place[/url]，ED：[url=http://music.163.com/#/song?id=32364537]キミとの未来[/url]（网易云大法好！）
关于翻译部分，有中文噢噢噢噢！太有诚意了！！！繁中的话个人完全能接受，虽然感觉有一些地方存在翻译问题，以及排版稍微有点奇怪，不过影响不大，当然如果能再翻好一点那就更好了……无论如何，看到了官方的诚意！自带中文哦！太难得了！听说这个消息的时候简直狂喜乱舞！！！这也是当时决定无论如何都要买的理由之一啦
有一点遗憾就是，豆知识被砍了……虽然我没有很看重这个，不过毕竟是日文版带有的内容，就这样砍掉总觉得有点可惜……可以的话还是希望玩到一个真正完整的游戏啊，嗯嗯
接下来，关于剧情和角色的话……这部分总觉得有很多感想，但又不知道该说什么（因为说起来太多了（噫）），每条线有每条线的精彩之处，合起来才是完整的故事嘛！啊加上前面提到的后日谈广播剧和官网的后日谈内容才是真正的完整哦w虽然花了不少时间玩，不过感觉也只是匆匆看了一遍剧情，想要真正理解各位角色的感情、了解她们的内心，大概还需要再放慢速度重新进行一次游戏，仔细品味一下才行，因此……二周目走起！有机会的话会再来补充评论的！啊我好开心啊，这波不亏……不，这波超值啊！！！

24364159.review:
花了22个小时终于达成了全部路线，真的是一款引人入胜的GAL GAME，尤其是对于我这种百合控来说，如果这个系列的作品再次登录steam并且还有中文版的话，我一定会再次购买的。那么来谈一下这部作品的优缺点吧，首先我想简体中文是必须的，这并不是什么难事，繁体到简体用工具花上一两天的时间就能够做好，几乎没有成本的事情却能够体现对大陆地区玩家的尊重。不过从翻译质量上来看确实是可圈可点。画风细腻，人设非常的棒，声优真的是非常好，感觉每一句配音都能仿佛听到角色呼之欲出的情感，最喜欢奈绪和明日香的声音啦。
最后说一下剧情吧，总体上来说非常优秀，各种选择同样能够让玩家和角色进行进一步的互动。然而我觉得最大的缺点是在BE比GE给人留下的印象深刻的多，往往GE只是让人开心一小会就结束了，而BE却让能让人念上一整天。感觉就是GE不够丰满，我觉得百合还是明亮点好，GE给玩家的开心感不能靠玩家脑补，是需要着重去塑造的。如果GE的流程能够更加长一点，GE的剧情能够再深入而感人一点，一定会能够被称为神作吧。

24343222.review:
プレイ時間約24時間、既読以外スキップなし。
実績コンプリートしたので初レビュー書いてみます。

主人公「大幸あすか」は小さいころの夢である「看護師」になるべく、
しっかり者の妹と共に帝都看護専門学校に入学しました。 
入学してすぐ、あすかが出会った二人の同級生、「天藤いつき」そして「武田さくや」。 
担任となった白衣の天使「大原かえで」の指導のもと、
笑い、時に苦しみながら、看護学生としての忙しい日々を過ごして行きます。 

最初はほのぼのと看護師になるべく、仲間たちと日々を過ごしていくのですが、
後半になるにつれ主人公”大幸あすか”と
仲間たちの知られざる真実や過去、そして衝撃の展開になっていきます。

なぜ、小さいころ「看護師」になりたいと思ったのか？
なぜ、さくやさんと最初に出会ったとき星がみえたのか？
なぜ、いつきさんはさくやさんと一緒にいるのか？
などなど
それは、遠い過去につながる出来事だったのです。

百合としても、異性が出てきたり思わせる内容もなく、
ましてやiPS細胞によって女の子同士で子供が出来てしまう世界になっています。
そして内容はとてもドキドキしました。絵も良くかわいくて、グッドエンドはとても良かったです。

BGMもとてもよく、専門用語などは豆知識として詳しく書かれていたり、
グッドエンド後は声優さんのひとことなどが聞けます。
それぞれのキャラの個性もよくて、内容もとても面白くて選択肢も結構あってすごく楽しめました。
そしてさまざまなルートを通して初めて理解した真実などがあって、とても深い内容でした。

長文になりましたがとてもおすすめする作品です。
初めてのレビューでうまく書けていませんが、参考になれば幸いです。
ありがとうございました。
